Sentence: So l was 16. My brother Jaime and l were riding, when we heard a scream. She ran out onto the road, clothes half torn off, with two men on her heels. Jaime scared away the men easily enough, while l wrapped her in my cloak. She was too scared to send off on her own, so while Jaime hunted down the rapers l took her to the nearest inn and fed her. Her name was Tysha. She was a wheelwright's orphan. And she was hungry. Together we finished off three chickens and a flagon of wine. lmpossible as it seems, there was a time when l was unaccustomed to wine. l forgot how afraid l was around girls. how l was always waiting for them to laugh at me or look away embarrassed, or ask me about my tall, handsome brother. l forgot about everything but Tysha. Sentence: I should hope so. The rebels came for Joffrey's head, they lost their own. Thanks to Father.

Sentence: Thanks to Father. Of course, it wasn't a rebel who tried to kill me.

Sentence: No? Curious. Bit of a comedown from chamber of the Hand. But then I don't suppose you need much room.

Sentence: Grand Maester Pycelle made the same joke. You must be proud to be as funny as a man whose balls brush his knees.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're meeting Father today?

Name: tyrion lannister

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Because I have hundreds of spies in my employ. The Master of Whisperers owes me a favor or two. Father told me. What do you want from him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: What do I want from him? He's my father. Do I need to want something? I'm sure he loves me dearly, as any father loves his child, his baby boy. Yet he hasn't come to visit once since arriving in King's Landing. I lay here, my face split in half, but Father never came.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're going to make me cry.

Name: tyrion lannister

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Because you've slandered me to Father before.

Name: cersei lannister

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: She lost an eye, if I remember correctly.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: If I remember correctly, she never stole a necklace again.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's not slander if it's true.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: And what's this truth you plan on telling him today?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Why are you so nervous about what I'm going to say to Father?

Sentence: Because you're a liar. I expect you'll tell lies about me, about Joffrey.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're a clever man, but you're not half as clever as you think you are.

Sentence: Still makes me more clever than you.

Name: bronn

Sentence: That's exactly who I am. And you're a grub in fancy armor who's better at beating little girls than fighting men. Now, I have an appointment with Lord Tyrion.

Sentence: I thought we were friends.

Sentence: I'm a knight now. Knights are worth double.

Sentence: I sent you here to advise the king. I gave you real power and authority. You chose to spend your days as you always have, bedding harlots and drinking with thieves.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Occasionally I drank with the harlots.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: What do you want, Tyrion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Why does everyone assume I want something? Can't I simply visit with my beloved father? My beloved father who somehow forgot to visit his wounded son after he fell on the battlefield.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Maester Pycelle assured me your wounds were not fatal.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I organized the defense of this city while you held court in the ruins of Harrenhal. I led the foray when the enemies were at the gate while your grandson, the king, quivered in fear behind the walls. I bled in the mud for our family. And as my reward, I was trundled off to some dark little cell. But what do I want? A little bloody gratitude would be a start.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Jugglers and singers require applause. You are a Lannister. Do you think I demanded a garland of roses every time I suffered a wound on a battlefield? Hmm? Now, I have seven kingdoms to look after and three of them are in open rebellion. So tell me what you want.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I want what is mine by right. Jaime is your eldest son, heir to your lands and titles. But he is a Kingsguard, forbidden from marriage or inheritance. The day Jaime put on the white cloak, he gave up his claim to Casterly Rock. I am your son and lawful heir.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You want Casterly Rock?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It is mine by right.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: We'll find you accommodations more suited to your name and as a reward for your accomplishments during the battle of Blackwater Bay. And when the time is right, you will be given a position fit for your talents so that you can serve your family and protect our legacy. And if you serve faithfully, you will be rewarded with a suitable wife. And I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Why?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Why? You ask that? You, who killed your mother to come into the world? You are an ill-made, spiteful little creature full of envy, lust, and low cunning. Men's laws give you the right to bear my name and display my colors since I cannot prove that you are not mine. And to teach me humility, the gods have condemned me to watch you waddle about wearing that proud lion that was my father's sigil and his father's before him. But neither gods nor men will ever compel me to let you turn Casterly Rock into your whorehouse. Go, now. Speak no more of your rights to Casterly Rock. Go.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Oh, one more thing. The next whore I catch in your bed, I'll hang.

Name: sansa stark

Wait out the winter where it's beautiful and warm.

I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother. A woman he didn't even know. So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live. Let him live and I'll love him. I'll be a mother to him. I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.

Name: varys
Sentence: As a boy, I traveled with a troupe of actors through the Free Cities. One day in Myr, a certain man made my master an offer too tempting to refuse. I feared the man meant to use me as I'd heard some men used small boys. But what he wanted was far worse. He gave me a potion that made me powerless to move or speak, yet did nothing to dull my senses. With a hooked blade he sliced me, root and stem, chanting all the while. He burned my parts in a brazier. The flames turned blue and I heard a voice answer his call. I still dream of that night. Not of the sorcerer, not of his blade. I dream of the voice from the flames. Was it a god? A demon? A conjurer's trick? I don't know. But the sorcerer called and a voice answered. And ever since that day, I have hated magic and all those who practice it. But you can see why I was eager to aid in your fight against Stannis and his Red Priestess. A symbolic revenge of sorts.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, ahem. I feel the need for actual revenge against the actual person who tried to have me killed. Which will require a degree of influence, which-

Name: varys
Sentence: You do not possess at the moment.

Name: varys
Sentence: But influence is largely a matter of patience, I have found. Once I had served the sorcerer's purpose, he threw me out of his house to die. I resolved to live to spite him. I begged. I sold what parts of my body remained to me. I became an excellent thief and soon learned that the contents of a man's letters are more valuable than the contents of his purse. Step by step, one distasteful task after another, I made my way from the slums of Myr to the small council chamber. Influence grows like a weed. I tended mine patiently until its tendrils reached from the Red Keep all the way across to the far side of the world where I managed to wrap them around something very special.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The Mad King was obsessed with it. He loved to watch people burn, the way their skin blackened and blistered and melted off their bones. He burned lords he didn't like. He burned Hands who disobeyed him. He burned anyone who was against him. Before long, half the country was against him. Aerys saw traitors everywhere. So he had his pyromancer place caches of wildfire all over the city- beneath the Sept of Baelor and the slums of Flea Bottom. Under houses, stables, taverns. Even beneath the Red Keep itself. Finally, the day of reckoning came. Robert Baratheon marched on the capital after his victory at the Trident. But my father arrived first with the whole Lannister army at his back, promising to defend the city against the rebels. I knew my father better than that. He's never been one to pick the losing side. I told the Mad King as much. I urged him to surrender peacefully. But the king didn't listen to me. He didn't listen to Varys who tried to warn him. But he did listen to Grand Maester Pycelle, that grey, sunken cunt. 'You can trust the Lannisters,' he said. 'The Lannisters have always been true friends of the crown.' So we opened the gates and my father sacked the city. Once again, I came to the king, begging him to surrender. He told me to bring him my father's head. Then he turned to his pyromancer. 'Burn them all,' he said. 'Burn them in their homes. Burn them in their beds.' Tell me, if your precious Renly commanded you to kill your own father and stand by while thousands of men, women, and children burned alive, would you have done it? Would you have kept your oath then?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: First, I killed the pyromancer. And then when the king turned to flee, I drove my sword into his back. 'Burn them all,' he kept saying. 'Burn them all.' I don't think he expected to die. He- he meant to burn with the rest of us and rise again, reborn as a dragon to turn his enemies to ash. I slit his throat to make sure that didn't happen. That's where Ned Stark found me.

I suppose if you work for the Iron Bank of Braavos and each one of your gold barges is worth half a kingdom, you tend not to be overly concerned with the kind of distinction...

Name: davos
Sentence: I need you to write a message.

Name: davos
Sentence: It's too important for me. I need a smart person to do it. Go on.

Name: davos
Sentence: To the offices of the Iron Bank of Braavos from Stannis Baratheon the one true king of Westeros.

Name: davos
Sentence: I need to get their attention. Go on. Write.

Name: sam
Sentence: He's seen some adventures, hasn't he?

Name: sam
Sentence: That's right. She'll clean and cook and look after the other girls' babies.

Name: sam
Sentence: No other work.

Name: sam
Sentence: I promise to come back and visit whenever I can. You'll be safer here. Who's gonna protect you at Castle Black? Me?

Name: sam
Sentence: This is different. They're brothers of the Night's Watch and I can't just stab them in the back and I can't run away, which is what we did at Craster's.

Name: sam
Sentence: You have to trust me. It's for the best.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, Gilly. Please don't.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Prince Oberyn.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: May we have the room?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: No, thank you.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Are you?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Which way is that?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Some believe the king choked.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I hear you studied poisons at the Citadel.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Your hatred for my family is rather well known. You arrive at the capital, an expert in poisoning, some days later my grandson dies of poisoning.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You spoke with Tyrion in this very brothel on the day that you arrived. What did you discuss?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: What did you discuss?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: For which you blame me.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Here I stand unarmed, unguarded. Should I be concerned?

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Men at war commit all kinds of crimes without their superiors' knowledge.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Categorically.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I'm sure he would enjoy speaking with you.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I could arrange for this meeting.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: There will be a trial for my son. And as custom dictates, three judges will render a verdict. I will preside. Mace Tyrell will serve as the second judge. I would like you to be the third.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Not long ago, the Tyrells sided with Renly Baratheon. Declared themselves enemies of the throne. Now they are our strongest allies.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I will also invite you to sit on the small council to serve as one of the new king's principal advisors.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: We are not the Seven Kingdoms until Dorne returns to the fold. The king is dead. The Greyjoys are in open rebellion. A wildling army marches on the Wall. And in the East, a Targaryen girl has three dragons. Before long, she will turn her eyes to Westeros. Only the Dornish managed to resist Aegon Targaryen and his dragons.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: We need each other. You help me serve justice to the king's assassins and I will help you serve justice to Elia's.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Podrick. Apologies for the stench.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: A noble effort.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You're a good lad. Any word of Shae?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I suppose that's a good thing. What are they saying about me out there?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Do you believe I murdered Joffrey?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No. Gods, no. The world is a better place without him, but I had nothing to do with it. I would like to think if I were arranging a royal assassination, I'd plan it in such a way that I wouldn't be standing there gawking like a fool when the king died. Trial in a fortnight. Have they announced the judges yet?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Of course.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Who will vote exactly as my father tells him to vote.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Oberyn? Give it to my father. He never fails to take advantage of a family tragedy.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Oh, I can call my own witnesses? How generous of them. Very well, my wife. Sansa.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Gone?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No one had more 'cause to kill Joffrey than Sansa, but the girl is no assassin. Whoever killed the king wanted me to lose my head for it. And with my wife's disappearance, it makes me seem that much more guilty. Podrick.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: They'll be following you now.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I don't know. They. They. The ominous they. The man pulling the strings. Or woman. My father. Maybe Joffrey was too much work for him. Sweet Tommen will be so much easier to handle. Whenever something bad happens to me, I assume it's my sister that had a hand in it. But say what you will of Cersei, she loves her children. She is the only one I'm certain had nothing to do with this murder. Which makes it unique as King's Landing murders go.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Varys could vouch for me if he dared.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Of course. Fetch Bronn. I have a job for him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Why not?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: And my brother? Will they at least allow me to see Jaime?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Ser Podrick Payne? Has a nice ring to it. What did you tell him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Are you going to accept their offer?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Testifying against me wasn't a suggestion. If they can't tempt you with honey, they'll choose something less sweet.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Pod, the trial's in a fortnight. They'll want an answer before that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I will not have you dying on my behalf. Do you hear me? If I have to take that long walk to the executioner's block, I don't want to see your head already mounted.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Pod, I am giving you an order. Go and find my brother. Tell him I need him. And get yourself out of King's Landing before it's too late. Pod! This is farewell.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Pod. There has never lived a more loyal squire.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Mance Rayder is coming. If the wildlings breach the Wall, they'll roll over everything and everyone for 1,000 Miles before they reach an army that can stop them.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Help him.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And the mutineers stayed?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We need to ride north and kill them all.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's not about justice. I told the wildlings we had over 1,000 men at Castle Black alone. Karl and the others know the truth as well as we do. How long do you think they'll keep that information to themselves when the wildlings are peeling their fingernails off? Mance has all he needs to crush us, he just doesn't know it yet. As soon as he gets his hands on them, he will. Then he'll throw his full strength at us. And even if every one of us kills 100 wildlings, there's still not a thing we can do to stop them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Are they attacking?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: A single rider. A champion of Meereen. They want you to send your own champion against him.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What is he doing?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: They're not meaningless if half the city you intend to take is listening to them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I have something to say to the people of Meereen. First, I will need this one to be quiet. Do I have a champion?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You are the commander of the Unsullied. I cannot risk you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Which is why you must remain by my side.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I've been by your side longer than any of them, Khaleesi. Let me stand for you today as well.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You are my most trusted advisor, my most valued general, and my dearest friend. I will not gamble with your life.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Very well. You have quite an audience. Make it worth their while.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Yes, win or lose, as long as the whole city is watching.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You sure you don't want a horse?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Horses are faster than men.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I am Daenerys Stormborn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Your Masters may have told you lies about me, or they may have told you nothing. It does not matter. I have nothing to say to them. Only to you. First I went to Astapor. Those who were slaves in Astapor now stand behind me, free. Next I went to Yunkai. Those who were slaves in Yunkai now stand behind me, free. Now I have come to Meereen. I am not your enemy. Your enemy is beside you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Your enemy steals and murders your children. Your enemy has nothing for you but chains and suffering and commands. I do not bring commands. I bring you a choice. And I bring your enemies what they deserve. Forward!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Fire!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How are the lessons coming?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You'll have to continue later. It's time.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Remind me, Ser Jorah, how many children did the Great Masters nail to mileposts?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: 163, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Yes, that was it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I will answer injustice with justice.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What the hell was that?

Name: bronn
Sentence: That was me knocking your ass to the dirt with your own hand.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You're a rare talent. When you're fighting cripples, anyway.

Name: bronn
Sentence: You learned to fight like a good little boy. I'll bet that thrust through the MadKing's back was pretty as a picture. You want to fight pretty or you want to win?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You talk to my brother this way?

Name: bronn
Sentence: All the time. He got used to it.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Do you think he did it?

Name: bronn
Sentence: No. Oh, he hated the little twat, sure. But who didn't? And poison's not his style. Or murder, for that matter. You want to know for sure, why don't you ask him?

Name: bronn
Sentence: You haven't been to see him yet, eh?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We're done for today.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Your brother ever tell you how I came into his service?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You stood for him in his trial by combat at the Eyrie.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Aye. But only when Lady Arryn demanded the trial take place that day. You were his first choice. He named you for his champion because he knew you would ride day and night to come fight for him. You gonna fight for him now?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: To tell you the truth, this isn't so bad. Four walls. A pot to piss in. I was chained to a wooden post covered in my own shit for months.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Is that supposed to make me feel better?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Maybe a bit. I'm sorry I didn't come sooner.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's complicated, yes. So how is our sister?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: How do you think? Her son died in her arms.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Her son?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Don't. You know what's coming?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: My trial for regicide.Yes, I know. I know the whole bloody country thinks I'm guilty. I know that one of my three judges has wished me dead more times than I can count. And that judge is my father. As for Cersei, well, she's probably working on a way to avoid a trial altogether by having me killed.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Now that you mention it, she did ask.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: So, should I turn around and close my eyes?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Depends. Did you do it?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The Kingslayer brothers. You like it? I like it. You're really asking if I killed your son?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Are you really asking if I'd kill my brother? How can I help you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Well, you could set me free.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You know I can't.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Then there's really nothing else to say.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What do you want me to do? Kill the guards? Sneak you out of the city in the back of a cart? I'm the Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Sorry, I'd forgotten. I'd hate for you to do something inappropriate.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Inappropriate? You're accused of killing the king.Freeing you is treason.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Except I didn't do it.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Which is why we're having a trial. A trial. If the killer threw himself before the Iron Throne, confessed to his crimes, and gave irrefutable evidence of his guilt, it wouldn't matter to Cersei. She won't rest until my heado s on a spike.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Not just yours. She's offering a knighthood to whomever finds Sansa Stark.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Sansa couldn't have done this. She had more reason than anyone in the Seven Kingdoms. Do you think it's a coincidence she disappeared the same night Joffrey died?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No, but... Sansa's not a killer. Not yet, anyway.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Where are you taking me?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I'm getting married to your Aunt Lysa. She's waiting for us at the Eyrie. You'll be safe there.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Did you kill Joffrey?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Did I kill Joffrey? I've been in the Vale for weeks.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I know it was you.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: And who helped me with this conspiracy?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Well, there was Ser Dontos. You used him to get me out of King's Landing, but you would never trust him to kill the king.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Why not?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Because you're too smart to trust a drunk.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Then perhaps it was your husband.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: How do you know?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I just do.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: You're right. He wasn't involvedi n Joffrey's death. But you were. Do you remember that lovely necklace Dontos gave you? I don't suppose you noticed that a stone was missing after the feast.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The poison. I don't understand. The Lannisters gave you wealth, power. Joffrey made you the Lord of Harrenhal.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused. If they don't know who you are or what you want, they can't know what you plan to do next.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I don't believe you. If they catch you, they'll put your head on a spike just like my father's. You'd risk that just to confuse them?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: So many men they risk so little. They spend their lives avoiding danger. And then they die. I'd risk everything to get what I want.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: And what do you want?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Everything. My friendship with the Lannisters was productive. But Joffrey, a vicious boy with a crown on his head, is not a reliable ally. And who could trust a friend like that?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Who could trust you?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I don't want friends like me. My new friends are predictable. Very reasonable people. As for what happened to Joffrey, well, that was something my new friends wanted very badly. Nothing like a thoughtful gift to make a new friendship grow strong.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The time has come, my dear. There's nothing more tedious than a trial. Except perhaps these gardens. If I have to take one more leisurely stroll through these gardens, I'll fling myself from the cliffs.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Have you been to see Tommen yet?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I wasn't originally meant to marry your grandfather Luthor, you know. He was engaged to my sister, your great-aunt Viola. I was to be given to some Targaryen or other. Marrying a Targaryen was all the rage back then. But the momentI saw my intended, with his twitchy little ferret's face and ludicrous silver hair, I knew he wouldn't do. So the evening before Luthor was to propose to my sister, I got lost on my way back from my embroidery lesson and happened upon his chamber.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: How absentminded of me.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The following morning, Luthor never made it down the stairs to propose to my sister 'cause the boy couldn't bloody walk.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And once he could, the only thing he wanted was what I'd given him the night before. I was good. I was very, very good. You are even better. But you need to act quickly. Cersei may be vicious, but she's not stupid. She'll turn the boy against you as soon as she can. And by the time you're married, it'll be too late. Luckily for you ,the Queen Regent is rather distracted at the moment, mourning her dear departed boy. Accusing her brother of his murder, which he didn't commit.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He could have done,but he didn't.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: But I do know. You don't think I'd let you marry that beast, do you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Shh. Don't you worry yourself about all that. You just do what needs to be done.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Bring it through! And again.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Very nice. Good.

Sentence: Let's see what you can do.

Sentence: Have you ever held a sword before? OLLY I was the best archer in our hamlet.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You two. Take it slow, try and disarm each other.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You know how to fight. You could have gone easier on him.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Grenn and I were helping them.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Someone has to train them.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: My father was highborn. My mother wasn't.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Jon Snow.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You fight well.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You sent for me, Your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Your Grace. How formal of you. How many Kingsguards are posted outside Tommen's door?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Ser Boros is on duty tonight. Tomorrow I believe...

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: So one? You have one man guarding the future king?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I promise you Tommen's safe. We're protecting him.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The way you protected Joffrey? Why did Catelyn Stark set you free?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I've been wondering for months. Ever since that great cow brought you back to the capital. Why did she set you free?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You know why. She'd hoped I'd send her daughters back to her.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: She hoped or did you promise?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I swore by all the gods that if her daughters were alive, I'd return them to her.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: So you made a sacred vow to the enemy.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I wanted to get back to you. Should I have told hert o fuck off?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You didn't mean it, then? You have no loyalty to Catelyn Stark?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Catelyn Stark's dead. So if I told you to leave the capital right now and find Sansa, if I told you to find that murderous little bitch and bring me her head, would you do it?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I know you went to see Tyrion. That creature who murdered our son.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I had to see him. I had to know for myself.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: And?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He didn't do it, Cersei.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You've always pitied him. Our poor little brother. Abused by the world. Despised by his father and sister. He'd kill us all if he could. I want four men at Tommen's door day and night. That will be all, Lord Commander.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Ser Jaime Lannister. Knighted and named to the Kingsguard in his 16th year. At the sack of King's Landing, murdered his king Aerys II. Pardoned by Robert Baratheon. Thereafter known as the Kingslayer.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: It's the duty of the Lord Commander to fill those pages. And there's still room left on mine.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Valyrian steel.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Mmm. It's yours.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I can't accept this.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: It was reforged from Ned Stark's sword. You'll use it to defend Ned Stark's daughter. You swore an oath to return the Stark girls to their mother. Lady Stark's dead. Arya's probably dead, too, but there's still a chance to find Sansa and get her somewhere safe. I've got something else for you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I hope I got your measurements right.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I'll find her. For Lady Catelyn. And for you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I almost forgot. I have one more gift.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I don't need a squire.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Of course you do.

Name: brienne
Sentence: He'll slow me down.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: My brother owes him a debt. He's not safe here. You're keeping him from harm. It's chivalry.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: See? He's a good lad.You'll get along.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Compliments of Lord Tyrion. His axe from the Blackwater.

Name: bronn
Sentence: What are you waiting for, a kiss? Ready the lady's horse.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They say the best swords have names. Any ideas?

Name: brienne
Sentence: Oathkeeper.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Good-bye, Brienne.

Name: sam
Sentence: I should neverhave taken her away.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: She wasn't safe here.

Name: sam
Sentence: She's not safe out there. I should have known. You told us there were wildlings south of the Wall. If they're raiding the smaller villages, Mole's Town could be next.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Castle Black could be next.

Name: sam
Sentence: I should go back for Gilly.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We have orders. No one's to leave the castle.

Name: sam
Sentence: I remember when you disobeyed orders and rode south to help Robb.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And I remember who came after me and brought me home. I know how hard it is, Sam, believe me. When you told me about Bran going beyond the Wall, all I could think about was getting my strength back so I could go and find him.

Name: sam
Sentence: I wish I could have convinced him to come back with me. I tried. Really, I did.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How fast could they travel? A crippled boy being pulled on a sledge by a simpleton?

Name: sam
Sentence: I don't know. They'd pass wildling villages. They could try to find shelter at one of them.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The wildlings have joined up with Mance. Every village or sheltered place will be deserted. Except...

Name: sam
Sentence: Craster's? You think Bra nmight have found...

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Thank you, Ser Alliser.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Ahem, brothers.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm going beyond the Wallto Craster's Keep. I'm going to capture the mutineers holed up there or kill them. I'm asking for volunteers to come with me. There's 60 miles of wilderness between here and Craster's and Mance Rayder has an army bearing down on us, but we have to do this. Our survival may depend on us getting to these mutineers before Mance does. They know the Wall. They know our defenses. If Mance learns what they know, we're lost. But if that's not enough, then consider this. If the Night's Watch are truly brothers, then Lord Commander Mormont was our father. He lived and died for the Watch and he was betrayed by his own men. Stabbed in the back by cowards. He deserved far better. All we can give him now is justice. Who will join me?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I can't let a recruit come north of the Wall.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Thank you, brothers.

Name: varys
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: There he is.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Long may he reign.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes. He wasn't, though, was he?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You still mourn for Joffrey?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He would have been your nightmare.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You knew exactly what he was. I did, too. You never love anything in the world the way you love your first child. Doesn't matter what they do. And what he did, it shocked me. Do you think I'm easily shocked?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The things he did shocked me. He's only a boy. A good boy. A decent boy. He always has been. Who was the last decent king, I wonder? He could be the first man who sits on that throne in fifty years to actually deserve it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He will need help... if he's going to rule well.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: A mother is not enough. You're still interested in being queen, I take it?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes, speak to your father. I'll speak to mine.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: King Joffrey Baratheon is dead. Murdered at his own wedding.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who told you to take the Navy?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So why did you do it?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many ships?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many men can they carry?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Would that be enough to take King's Landing?

Name: jorah mormont

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Lord Baelish has told many lies. All to protect me. Since my father was executed, I have been a hostage in King's Landing. A plaything for Joffrey to torture or Queen Cersei to torment. They beat me, they humiliated me, they married me to the Imp. I had no friends in King's Landing...except one. He saved me. Smuggled me away when he had the chance. He knew I'd be safe here in the Eyrie with my own blood, my Aunt Lysa. The Lannisters have friends everywhere. Even the Vale. He made me swear not to tell anyone my true name.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You knew her well, my lords, my lady. You knew she was a troubled woman. She always loved Lord Baelish. She told me herself. From the moment he arrived at the gates of Riverrun, a boy of eight carrying everything he owned in a little sack. She confessed to me she never loved Lord Arryn. She did as her father commanded, as so many of us have. When the gods finally allowed her to be with Lord Baelish, she was so happy. For a time. My aunt was a jealous lady. She was terrified that Lord Baelish didn't love her anymore. That he would abandon her for a younger woman. And then...one day she saw him kiss me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: It was a peck on the cheek, Lord Royce, nothing more. Lord Baelish is my uncle now, in truth, by marriage. He's always been so kind to me. I was so happy to be here, to be free. All because of him. But my aunt turned on me. She cursed me. Called me a whore. Promised to throw me through the Moon Door. When Lord Baelish tried to calm her, she struck him. She said she didn't want to live anymore. She stood on the edge of that Moon Door. He tried to reason with her. Promised her she was the only one he had ever loved, but she stepped through those doors and she was...*begins sobbing*

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why did the usurper pardon you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No, speak to me here. Explain it to me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The pardon was signed the year we met. Why were you pardoned? Unless you're saying this document was forged.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why, then?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What was the content of these letters?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What information?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You told him I was carrying Drogo's child?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Yes or no?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Don't call me that. Did you tell him I was carrying Drogo's child?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: That wine merchant tried to poison me because of your information.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Because you knew it was poisoned.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You betrayed me from the first.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You sold my secrets to the man who killed my father and stole my brother's throne...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: and you want me to forgive you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Love? Love? How can you say that to me? Any other man, and I would have you executed. But you, I do not want you in my city dead or alive. Go back to your masters in King's Landing. Collect your pardon if you can.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Don't ever presume to touch me again or speak my name. You have until dusk to collect your things and leave this city. If you're found in Meereen past break of day, I'll have your head thrown into Slaver's Bay. Go. Now.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: They would have thrown you through the Moon Door if they found you guilty.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: If they'd have executed you, what would they have done with me?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Neither do I.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I know what you want.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Lots of things make me happy.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Killing Polliver, killing Rorge.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: At least I could have been there to watch. I wanted to see the look in his eyes when he knew it was over.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You protected him for most of his life. You think you could have saved him?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: That's your stupid pride talking. It's why you'll never be a great killer. I'd have killed Joffrey with a chicken bone if I had to.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You should have let me burn it.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: That fleabite's got you walking a lot slower than you used to.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You really think my aunt will pay for me?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I've never even met her.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I'm not a lady.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Shall we go?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Wine always helps. I thank you for it. Trial by combat. Deciding a man's guilt or innocence in the eyes of the gods by having two other men hack each other to pieces. Tells you something about the gods. How much longer?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Soon.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Do you think Oberyn has a chance? The Red Viper of Dorne. You don't get a name like that unless you're deadly, right?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I've never seen him fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Oh, he's going to die. I'm going to die.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Oberyn believes in himself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: That's putting it mildly. What's the punishment for regicide? Drawing and quartering? Hanging? Breaking at the wheel?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Beheading.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Seems rather ordinary. And he was my nephew as well, so what is that? Fratricide is brothers. Filicide is sons. Nepoticide. That's the one. Matricide, patricide, infanticide, suicide. There's no kind of killing that doesn't have its own word.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Cousins.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Cousins, you're right. There is no word for cousin killing. Well done. Do you remember cousin Orson? Orson Lannister?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Of course. Wet-nurse dropped him on his head. Left him simple.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Simple? Used to sit all day in the garden. Crushing beetles with a rock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Nothing made him happier.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Nothing made you happier. You'd think being tormented from birth would have given you some affinity for the afflicted.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: On the contrary. Laughing at another person's misery was the only thing that made me feel like everyone else.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The joke wore thin, though.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: For you. You drifted away.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I had other interests.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, other interests. But I stayed with Orson.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Why?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I was curious. Why was he smashing all those beetles? What did he get out of it? First thing I did was ask him. "Orson, why are you smashing all those beetles?" He gave me an answer. "Smash the beetles. Smash 'em. Khuu! Khuu! Khuu!" I wasn't deterred. I was the smartest person I knew. Certainly I had the wherewithal to unravel the mysteries that lay at the heart of a moron. So I went to Maester Volarik's library.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Volarik. Tried to touch me once.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Turns out, far too much has been written about great men and not nearly enough about morons. Doesn't seem right. In any case, I found nothing that illuminated the nature of Orson's affliction or the reason behind his relentless beetle slaughter. So I went back to the source. I may not have been able to speak with Orson, but I could observe him, watch him the way men watch animals to come to a deeper understanding of their behavior. *picks up a beetle* And as I watched, I became more and more sure of it. There was something happening there. His face was like the page of a book written in a language I didn't understand. But he wasn't mindless. He had his reasons. And I became possessed with knowing what they were. I began to spend inordinate amounts of time watching him. I would eat my lunch in the garden, chewing my mutton to the music of "khuu, khuu, khuu". And when I wasn't watching him, I was thinking about him. Father droned on about the family legacy and I thought about Orson's beetles. I read the histories of Targaryen conquests. Did I hear dragon wings? No. I heard "khuu, khuu, khuu" and I still couldn't figure out why he was doing it. And I had to know, because it was horrible that all these beetles should be dying for no reason.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Every day around the world, men, women, and children are murdered by the score. Who gives a dusty fuck about a bunch of beetles?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I know, I know. But still, it filled me with dread. Piles and piles of them, years and years of them. How many countless living crawling things smashed and dried out and returned to the dirt? In my dreams I found myself standing on a beach made of beetle husks stretching as far as the eye could see. I woke up crying, weeping for their shattered little bodies. I tried to stop Orson once.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He was twice your size.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He just pushed me aside with a "khuu" and kept on smashing. Every day until that mule kicked him in the chest and killed him. *puts the beetle back on the ground* So what do you think? Why did he do it? What was it all about?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I don't know.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Good luck today.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Looks like very light armor.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: You could at least wear a helmet. You shouldn't drink before a fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It could get you killed. It could get me killed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Thank the gods.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: standing up* The gods have made their will known. Tyrion Lannister, in the name of King Tommen of the House Baratheon, First of His Name, you are hereby sentenced to death.

Name: sam

Name: sam

Sentence: Well what do you want me to say?

Name: sam
Sentence: I want you to tell me what it was like to have someone. To be with someone. To love someone and have them love you back. We're all gonna die a lot sooner than I'd planned. You're the closest I'll ever get to know it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: So you and Gilly never-

Name: sam
Sentence: No...she just had a baby! ...and she never offered.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: But if she had, you wouldo ve? You'd have broken your vows?

Name: sam
Sentence: The interesting thing is, our vows never specifically forbid intimate relations with women.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What?

Name: sam
Sentence: I shall take no wife" yes, that's in there, there's no denying that. "I shall father no children" it's very specific. But what our vows have to say about other...activities...is open to interpretation.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't think Ser Alliser cares much for interpretation.

Name: sam
Sentence: Anyway, there's nothing for him to interpret. We didn't. So what's it like?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's...there's this person, this whole other person. And you're wrapped up in them and they're wrapped up in you and...you...for a little...for a little while you're more than just you, you're...well I don't know, I'm not a bleedin' poet!

Name: sam
Sentence: No, you're really not.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And what did I get for it? An arrow six inches from my heart.

Name: sam
Sentence: There'll be arrows for all of us soon I imagine.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There will.

Name: sam
Sentence: They've already done the worst thing to me they could ever do.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Go get some sleep, Sam. I'll take this watch.

Sentence: Maester Aemon. How did you know-

Name: sam

Sentence: Oh, Pyp. Open the fucking gate!

Sentence: Yes, well, best get used to it.

Name: sam
Sentence: Are you alright? Shh, you're alright. Yeah, of course you are my brave little fella.

Name: sam
Sentence: I'm so so sorry. I didn't know until I got back.

Name: sam

Name: sam
Sentence: Anyone who tries to throw you out will be having words with me. From now on, wherever you go, I go too.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There we go, boys. That's one. There's two. Come on, let's get the next lot. That's the last of the oil, Ser Alliser.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Yes sir.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It was a difficult decision either way, Ser.

Name: sam
Sentence: You'll be safe down here. I'll check on you as soon as I can.

Name: sam
Sentence: I'm not leaving you!

Name: sam
Sentence: I...I didn't mean in the same room.

Name: sam
Sentence: Help my brothers.

Name: sam
Sentence: I can't just hide here with you while they're fighting out there.

Name: sam
Sentence: Look. I am a man of the Night's Watch, Gilly. I made a promise to defend The Wall and I have to keep it, because that's what men do.

Name: sam
Sentence: I promise you I won't die.

Name: sam
Sentence: There's a lot more Wildlings on the other side of the wall than this side. We've got us some weapons and things. This is the perfect place for us to be.

Name: sam
Sentence: Of course I'm afraid, there's a band of Wildlings coming to kill us.

Name: sam
Sentence: I didn't know I was going to kill it, but I had to do something I didn't have any choice, he was going to kill Gilly and take the baby. If someone had asked me my name right then, I wouldn't have known. I wasn't Samwell Tarly anymore. I wasn't a Steward in the Night's Watch or son of Randyll Tarly or any of that. I was nothing at all. And when you're nothing at all, there's no more reason to be afraid.

Name: sam
Sentence: Yes, well, I'm not nothing anymore.

Name: sam
Sentence: Did you get one?

Name: sam
Sentence: Yeah?

Name: sam
Sentence: If you keep missing we will.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Archers! Knock your arrows! Draw! Loose!

Name: jon snow

Name: jon snow

Sentence: to Olly* Get me to the top! You hear me?!

Sentence: Your name's Olly, right? Listen to me Olly, get me to the top and when we give a signal, bring us back down. Do you hear me?

Name: jon snow

Sentence: We held them off.

Name: sam
Sentence: This is a great victory.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Great victory? Mance was testing our defenses. He almost made it through. And he has more giants, he has more mammoths. He has a thousand times as many men. They'll hit us again tonight. Maybe we can hold them off for a day or two, but we can never beat them.

Name: sam
Sentence: Where are you going?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm going to find Mance.

Name: sam
Sentence: To...you can't do that. No one gave you any orders.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Who's left to give orders? The Wildling army is only an army because of Mance. He united a hundred warring tribes. Without Mance they lose their leader. They lose their purpose, they go back to fighting each other, scatter back to their home.

Name: sam
Sentence: Without Mance? You're going to kill him?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm going to try.

Name: sam
Sentence: They'll never let you within a hundred yards of him. And if you did, even if you managed to kill him.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He'll kill me. If I don't go he'll kill me anyway. They'll kill the rest of us too.

Name: sam
Sentence: He won't just kill ya. They'll boil you. They'll filet you. They'll make it last days!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're right. It's a bad plan. What's your plan?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: They held the gate. Get some brothers down here to help you. You need to burn the bodies. Raise the outer gate, then lower it again as soon as I'm out.

Name: sam
Sentence: What are you doing?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I promised Jeor I'd never lose it again. *he hands the sword to Sam* In case I don't come back.

Name: sam
Sentence: Jon. Come back.

Sentence: I've been sent to negotiate with you.

Sentence: You're the king beyond the wall?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You know who I am?

Name: davos
Sentence: This is Stannis Baratheon, the one true king of the seven kingdoms.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: It is customary to kneel when surrendering to a king.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: I'll have thousands of your men in chains by nightfall, I'll have nowhere to put them and nothing to feed them. I'm not here to slaughter beat dogs. Their fate depends on their king.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Take these men away.

Sentence: Your father was an honorable man.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He was, your grace.

Name: stannis baratheon

Name: jon snow

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Your grace. If my father'd seen the things that I've seen, he'd also tell you to burn the dead before nightfall. All of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Bloody Martells.

Sentence: You're dismissed, Grand Maester.

Sentence: Very well then.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Not another word. We've been over this, the matter's closed.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm opening it again.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: You are betrothed to Loras Tyrell. Still betrothed to Loras Tyrell and you will marry Loras Tyrell as soon as Tommen marries Margaery.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I will not.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Jaime cannot marry or inherit lands. Tyrion's sentence will be carried out tomorrow. You have, on several occasions, made great claims about your commitment to this family's future. Your role in that future is more vital now than it ever was.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I don't care. I will stay in King's Landing where I belong with my son, the king.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: When you were nine years old, I was called to the capital. I decided to take your brother with me and not you. You insisted that you would not be left at Casterly Rock under any circumstances and if you recall-

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm not interested in hearing another one of your smug stories about the time you won. This isn't going to be one of those times.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Do you think you'll be the first person dragged into a sept to be married against her will?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: When you marched into the throne room to tell me we'd won the Battle at Blackwater, do you remember?! I was sitting on the iron throne with Tommen. I was about to give him essence of nightshade, that's how far I was willing to go when I thought someone awful had come to take my son away. Someone awful is coming to take him away.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: No.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Joffrey is dead. Myrcella's been sold like livestock. And now you want to ship me off to Highgarden and steal my boy, my last boy. Margaery will dig her claws in and you will dig your claws in and you will fight over him like beasts until you rip him apart. I will burn our house to the ground before I let that happen.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: And how will you do that?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'll tell everyone the truth.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: And what truth would that be?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You don't know, do you? You never believed it. How is that possible? What am I saying, of course it's possible. How can someone so consumed by the idea of his family have any conception what his actual family was doing? We were right there in front of you and you didn't see us. One look in the past twenty years, one real look and you wouldo ve known.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: Known what?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Everything they say is true. About Jaime and me.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: No, no, no, no, no.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Your legacy is a lie.

Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: I don't believe you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes you do.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You won. One fewer brother. Must be proud of yourself. There's really nothing you wouldn't do, is there?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: For my family, no. I would do things for my family you couldn't imagine.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Tyrion is your family.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He's not.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You don't get to choose.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I do, so do you. You can choose the creature that killed our mother to come into this world-

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Are you really mad enough to blame him for that? He didn't decide to kill her. He was an infant.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: A disease doesn't decide to kill you, all the same you cut it out before it does. What do you decide? What do you choose?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The things I did to get back to you, to endure all that, only to find you-

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I choose you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Those are words.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Yes. Like the ones I just said to father. I told him.

Sentence: Told him what?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I told him about us.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You told him?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I told him I wouldn't marry Loras Tyrell. I told him I'm staying right here with Tommen, with you.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You think he'll just accept that?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Go and ask him.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What did you say?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I don't want to talk about Tywin Lannister. I don't choose Tywin Lannister, I don't love Tywin Lannister. I love my brother. I love my lover. People will whisper, they'll make their jokes. Let them. They're all so small I can't even see them. I only see what matters.

Name: jaime lannister

Name: brienne
Sentence: When I was a girl, my father held a ball. I'm his only living child, so he wants to make a good match for me. He invited dozens of young lords to Tarth. I didn't want to go, but he dragged me to the ballroom. . And it was wonderful. None of the boys noticed how mulish and tall I was. The shoved each other, and threatened to duel if they thought it was their turn to dance. And whispered in my ear how they wanted to marry me and take me back to their castles. . My father smiled at me and I smiled at him. I'd never been so happy. . Till I saw a few of the boys sniggering. And then they all started to laugh, they couldn't keep the game going any longer. They were toying with me. ‘Brienne the Beauty', they called me. Great joke. And I realized I was the ugliest girl alive. A great lumbering beast. I tried to run away, but Renly Baratheon took me in his arms. “Don't let them see your tears,” he told me. “They're nasty little shits. The nasty little shits aren't worth crying over.” He danced with me and none of the other boys could say a word. And he was the king's brother after all.

Sentence: When you were an infant, , the Dornish trailer landed on Dragonstone. His goods were junk except for one wooden doll. He'd even sewn a dress on it in the colors of our House. No doubt he'd heard of your birth, and assumed new fathers were easy targets. I still remember how you smiled when I put that doll in your cradle, , and you pressed it to your cheek. . By the time we burnt the doll, it was too late. . I was told you would die. Or worse, the grayscale would go slow. . Let you grow just enough to know the world before taking it away from you. Everyone advised me to send you to the ruins of Valyria to live out your short life with the Stone men, before the sickness spread to the castle. I told them all to go to hell. . I called in every maester on this side of the world. Every healer, every apothecary. They stopped the disease and saved your life. Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I saw her once. I was a boy, living with your mother's family. Lord Whent had a great tourney at Harrenhal. Everyone was there. The Mad King, your father, Robert Baratheon. And Lyanna, she was already promised to Robert. You can imagine what it was like for me, a boy from nowhere, with nothing to his name, watching these legendary men, tilting at the lists. The last two riders were Barristan Selmy and Rhaegar Targaryen. When Rhaegar won, everyone cheered for the prince. I remember the girls laughing when he took off his helmet and they saw that silver hair. How handsome he was. Until he rode right past his wife, Elia Martell, and all the smiles died. I've never seen so many people so quiet. He rode past his wife, and he lay a crown of winter roses in Lyanna's lap. Blue as frost. How many tens of thousands had to die because Rhaegar chose your aunt?

Sentence: Gold and glory. Oh, and hate. If you've ever met my sister, you'd understand. So now that it's clear we're on the same side? . A high born knight from the North of Westeros, down on his luck in Essos. Dragon epaulettes? Bear sigil breast plate. You're Jorah Mormont. I have to ask how, exactly, were you serving your Queen in a whore house, half a world away? Is it possible, that you were running? Why would you be running? And why would she have sent you away? Oh, wait! You were spying on her, weren't you? It's all coming back to me! I was drunk through most of the Small Council meetings, but it's all coming back. You passed notes to Varys's little birds. She found out, didn't she? Found out, and exiled you. . And now you hope to win back her favor with a gift. A risky scheme. One might even say, desperate. Do you think Daenerys would execute me, and pardon you? I'd say the reverse is just as likely.

Sentence: When I was a young man I heard a story about a baby born during the worst storm in living memory. She was eventually sold off to some warlord on the edge of the world and that appeared to be that. And then a few years later the most well informed person I knew told me that this girl without wealth, lands, or armies had somehow acquired all 3 in a very short span of time, along with three dragons. Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Whomever Ser Jorah was when he started informing on you, he is no longer that man. I can't remember seeing the same man as devoted to anything as he is to serving you. He claims he would kill for you and die for you, and nothing I have witnessed gives me reason to doubt him. And yet he did betray you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Did he have an opportunity to confess his betrayals?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Yes, many opportunities.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: And did he?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No. Not until forced to do so.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He worships you. He is in love with you, I think. But he did not trust you with the truth - an unpleasant truth, to be sure - but one of great significance to you. He did not trust that you would be wise enough to forgive him.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So I should kill him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: A ruler who kills those that are devoted to her is not a ruler that inspires devotion. And you're going to need to inspire devotion, and lots of it, if you're ever going to rule across the Narrow Sea. But you cannot have him by your side when you do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Remove Ser Jorah from the city.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: My son. Let me speak to--

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: My face will be the last thing you see before--

Name: arya stark
Sentence: My name is Lana. I'm an orphan. When I was 8 I begged enough money to buy my first bucket of oysters, and I sold that bucket and made enough money to buy 2 more.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Iit took a while but I finally saved enough to buy myself an oyster cart. Now every morning I make my way down to the canals. I pass the fish mongers and the bakers. I usually see Lhara, my first customer of the day on my way home. Then I turn left onto Moonsinger Lane--

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Left onto Ragman Lane, where I do most of my trade.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: How will she serve him?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: What will she do there?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: See what?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Oysters, clams and cockles!

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Oysters clams and cockles! Oysters clams and cockles!

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Best in the city.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: So why would a captain make the wager in the first place?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: If the captain dies, the thin man pays his family a lot of money.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: The Many Faced God. You said you didn't know what I would see at the docks.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: And then what?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The charges?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: All lies.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I wish you'd said it sooner. Any word from Jaime?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Tell him I need to speak to him.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What about my son, the king? If you can visit me then surely the king--

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You need to talk to him, you need to talk to my son to come and see me, come and see his mother.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I can't stay here.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Confess? To the High Sparrow? I won't. I made him. I rose him up from nothing, I will not kneel before some barefooted commoner and beg his forgiveness.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Why. Why Theon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Not Theon. There is no Theon. Reek.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Reek. Why did you tell him, Reek?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I was helping you. You were trying to escape, there is no escape. Not ever. Theon Greyjoy tried to escape. The master knew. He knows everything. He hunted him, he caught him, he strapped him to a cross, and cut away piece after piece until there was no Theon left.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Good. If it weren't for you I'd still have a family. If I could do to you what Ramsay did to you right here, right now, I would.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I deserved everything. I deserve to be Reek. I did terrible things. Turned on Robb. Captured Winterfell. Killed those boys.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: They weren't “those boys”, they were Bran and Rickon. They were your brothers, you'd know them since they were born.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: They weren't. They were only--

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Only what?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I can't..

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Tell me!

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I can't, not unless the master says...

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Tell me, they weren't what?!

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: They weren't...

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Tell me why Bran and Rickon should be dead while you still breathe the air. Tell me to my face Theon, tell me that they weren't your brothers!

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: They weren't Bran and Rickon! I couldn't find them. It was two farm boys. I killed them and burned them so no one would know.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You didn't…?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Do you know where they went, Bran and Rickon?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I can't talk to you anymore.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Theon, you have to tell me, do you have any idea where Bran and Rickon--

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Not Theon, Reek!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So have you decided yet? Whether I'm worthy of your service?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Have you decided yet whether you're going to have me killed?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It's probably my safest option.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I can see why you would think so. It's what your father would have done.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what would your father do?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: My father? Who publicly sentenced me to death? I'd say his thoughts on having me killed were abundantly clear.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Is that why you killed him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Some day if you decide not to execute me, I'll tell you all about why I killed my father. And on that day, should it ever come, we'll need more wine than this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I know what my father was. What he did. I know the Mad King earned his name.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: So here we sit, two terrible children of two terrible fathers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm terrible?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I've heard stories.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Why did you travel to the other side of the world to meet someone terrible?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: To see if you were the right kind of terrible.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Which kind is that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The kind that prevents your people from being even more so.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I did reopen the fighting pits. Under my rule murder will once again become entertainment.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, that was wise. And you agreed to marry someone you loathed for the greater good. Very impressive. My own sister married someone she loathed as well, though not by choice and certainly not for the greater good, Gods forbid. She ended up having him killed.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Perhaps it won't come to that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's not impossible that Varys was right about you after all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Varys? King Robert's spy master?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes. He was the one who convinced me to come find you. He was my travelling companion before Ser Jorah seized that role for himself.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Jorah sent my secrets to Varys. For 20 years the spider oversaw the campaign to find and kill me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He did what he had to do to survive. He did a lot of other things that he didn't have to do. I suspect he's the main reason you weren't slaughtered in your crib.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: But you trust him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, oddly. He might be the only person in the world that I trust. Besides my brother.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The brother who killed my father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: That's the one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Perhaps I will have you killed after all.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Your queenly prerogative. I had given up on life until Varys convinced me you might be worth living for. You chop off my head? Well, my final days were interesting.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm not going to kill you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No? Banish me?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: So if I'm not going to be murdered, and I'm not going to be banished...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You're going to advise me. While you can still speak in complete sentences.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Advise you on what?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How to get what I want.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The Iron Throne. Perhaps you should try wanting something else.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: If I want jokes I'll get myself a proper fool.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'm not entirely joking. There's more to the world than Westeros after all. How many hundreds of thousands of lives have you changed for the better here? Perhaps this is where you belong. Where you can do the most good.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I fought so that no child born into Slaver's Bay would ever know what it was like to be bought or sold. I will continue that fight here and beyond. But this is not my home.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: And when you get back to your home, who supports you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: The common people.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Let's be generous and assume that's going to happen. Here in Slaver's Bay you had the support of the common people and only the common people. What was that like, ruling without the rich? House Targaryen is gone, not a single person who shares your blood is alive to support you. The Starks are gone as well, our two terrible fathers saw to that. The remaining Lannisters won't back you, not ever. Stannis Baratheon won't back you either, his entire claim to the Throne depends on the illegitimacy of yours. That leaves the Tyrells. Not impossible, but not enough.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Lannister, Targaryen, Baratheon, Stark, Tyrell. They're all just spokes on a wheel. This one's on top, then that ones on top and on and on it spins, crushing the people on the ground.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's a beautiful dream. Stopping the wheel. You're not the first person to have dreamt it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm not going to stop the wheel. I'm going to break the wheel.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You said whoever wins would fight at the Great Pit in front of the queen. I won.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I've been flogged if it makes you happy. I'm the best you've got. If I win at the Great Pit how much can you sell me for?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Let me fight for her and I belong to you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'll get out of here, you realize. Before long.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I can make you a wealthy woman. A lady of the court.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I can make sure you die in the most hideous way imaginable, and all I do is sit here imagining ways for you to die.

Name: sam
Sentence: No.

Name: sam
Sentence: How are you?

Name: sam
Sentence: You know what I mean.

Sentence: Are you scared?

Sentence: Who's there?

Name: sam
