Name: sam
Sentence: Not to worry. Men brawl from time to time. It's only natural.

Name: sam
Sentence: You're a good lad.

Name: sam
Sentence: Now then. How can I help?

Name: sam
Sentence: Yes?

Name: sam
Sentence: We've been fighting them for years.

Name: sam
Sentence: Wildlings are people, just like us. There are good ones and bad ones.

Name: sam
Sentence: Olly...

Name: sam
Sentence: I've seen the army of the dead. I've seen the white walkers, and they're coming for us, for all the living. And when it's time we'll need every last man we can find.

Name: sam
Sentence: Jon's taking a risk, but he has to. We don't stand a chance otherwise. Sometimes a man has to make hard choices, choices that might look wrong to others but you know are right in the long run.

Name: sam
Sentence: With all my heart.

Name: sam
Sentence: Try not to worry Olly. I've been worrying about Jon for years. He always comes back.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Does that make me a fool?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He's not my prisoner.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're allies.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're not here to fight. We're here to talk.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: My name's Jon Snow. I'm Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. We're not friends. We've never been friends. We won't become friends today. This isn't about friendship. This is about survival. This is about putting a 700 foot wall between you and what's out there.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: In normal times we wouldn't. But these aren't normal times. The white walkers don't care if a man's Free Folk or Crow. We're all the same to them. Meat to their army. But together we can beat them.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It's not a trick. It's a gift for those who join us.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Dragonglass. A man of the Night's Watch used one of these daggers to kill a walker.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No. But I trust the man.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Come with me and I'll share these weapons.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There are good lands south of the wall. The Night's Watch will allow you through the tunnel and allow your people to farm those lands.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I knew Mance Rayder. He never wanted a war with the Night's Watch, he wanted a new life for his people. For you. We're prepared to give you that new life.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: If you swear you join us when the real war begins.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: He died.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I put an arrow through his heart.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm not asking you to forget your dead. I'll never forget mine. I lost 50 brothers the night that Mance attacked the wall. But I'm asking you to think about your children now. They'll never have children of their own if we don't band together. The Long Night is coming and the dead come with it. No clan can stop them. The free folk can't stop them. The Night's Watch can't stop them. And all the southern kings can't stop them. Only together, all of us, and even then it might not be enough, but at least then we'll give the fuckers a fight.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How many are with us? 5000?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're leaving too many behind.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And he knew them better than I ever will.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Get in line! Get in line!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Hold the line! Hold the line!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Get them to the ship and come back for me!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Now!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You should be on one of those boats.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You have my word. I've given orders.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Night's Watch with me! Move! Move! Move!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The Dragonglass!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Go! Go! Go!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Let's go now! Now!

Name: davos
Sentence: A band of 20 men, maybe less. They were in and out before anyone spotted them, burnt our food stores to the ground, all our siege weapons were destroyed, dozens of tents were--

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Horses?

Name: davos
Sentence: We're still getting a count, but hundreds are dead.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: 20 men rode into our camp without a single guard sounding the alarm?

Name: davos
Sentence: The northerners know more about their land than we ever will.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Put last night's guards in chains, either they fell asleep or they were conspiring with the enemy. Find out the truth and then hang them.

Name: davos
Sentence: Unless there's a thaw, we can't press forward to Winterfell, and we don't have enough food to get us back to Castle Black.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: We're not returning to Castle Black.

Name: davos
Sentence: Forgive me, Your Grace, I never claimed to be an expert in military matters. But if we can't march forward, and we won't march back…

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Have the dead horses butchered for meat.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: It was a failure.

Name: sam
Sentence: It wasn't.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I went to save them, I failed.

Name: sam
Sentence: You didn't fail him, or him, or her. Every one of them is alive because of you, and no one else.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I don't think that fact's lost on them.

Name: davos
Sentence: You sent for me, Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Find you some healthy horses and a few good men to guard you, I'm sending you back to Castle Black. Tell the Lord Commander to send food, supplies, fresh horses, in return when I take the throne I'll make sure the Night's Watch has all the men it requires. He can guard all 19 castles if he so wishes.

Name: davos
Sentence: Your Grace, you've named me your Hand.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Yes.

Name: davos
Sentence: The King's Hand should never abandon the King, especially in a time of war.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You're not abandoning me, you're obeying a command.

Name: davos
Sentence: A boy with a scroll could deliver this message.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: And if Jon Snow refuses a boy with a scroll, what does the boy say? I didn't name you hand for your expertise in military matters, ride for Castle Black, don't come back empty handed.

Name: davos
Sentence: Your Grace, perhaps Queen and Princess Shireen could accompany me.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: My family stays with me.

Name: davos
Sentence: At least let me take Shireen. A siege is no place for a little girl.

Name: davos
Sentence: What's this one now?

Name: davos
Sentence: Well that sounds like a proper story.

Name: davos
Sentence: But the dragon only saw a dumb man, holding a mirrored shield.

Name: davos
Sentence: Thus ending the dragonslaying career of Ser Byron Swann. I made you something, Princess.

Name: davos
Sentence: Do you like it?

Name: davos
Sentence: You're very welcome.

Name: davos
Sentence: Of course I will.

Name: davos
Sentence: Because you deserve it. My son was always on me trying to teach me to read. Gods, I was stubborn about it. Made it this far without reading, seemed to me I could make it to the grave. I wish I had listened to them. This is my own poor way of saying thank you for teaching me to be a grown up. I'll be gone for a few days, Princess. I'll want to hear all about the dance of dragons when I'm back.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Prince Doran.

Sentence: Princess Myrcella.

Sentence: What a lovely dress.

Sentence: You must be cold.

Sentence: Prince Trystane. How's your jaw?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Looking out for the safety of my niece, the princess Myrcella.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Ah. Excellent. The last meal before the beheading.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm afraid he does.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I accept.

Sentence: You have my word.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He said it was just a fleabite. The fault is mine. Bronn is merely a soldier following my orders. If anyone should be punished it's me.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You're a good man.

Sentence: Am I going to be happy at the end of this walk?

Sentence: The most beautiful woman in the world.

Sentence: Only the one.

Sentence: Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cock--

Sentence: If you had to choose between Rhaenyra and Aegon, who would you have chosen?

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Sometimes a person has to choose. Sometimes the world forces his hand. If a man knows what he is and remains true to himself, the choice is not choice at all. He must fulfill his destiny and become who he is meant to be. However much he may hate it.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: You don't even know what I'm talking about.

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: Yes there is.

Sentence: Forgive me.

Sentence: Where have you been?

Sentence: The smaller man it is.

Sentence: I'm not putting my money anywhere.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Has your experience ever involved any actual fighting? You, yourself, have you ever tried to kill a man that was trying to kill you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: There's always been more than enough death in the world for my taste. I can do without it in my leisure time.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's easy to confuse what is with what ought to be. Especially when what is has worked in your favor.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: That is greatness?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: My father would have liked you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: One day your great city will return to the dirt as well.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: If need be.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: If it comes to that they would have died for a good reason.

Name: daenerys targaryen

Sentence: You can end this.

Sentence: He raised his hands. And they all stood up at once. Tens of thousands of them, the biggest army in the world.

Sentence: I'm gonna hope they don't learn how to climb the wall.

Sentence: But… you killed a White Walker.

Sentence: Not enough. The first Lord Commander in history to sacrifice the lives of sworn Brothers to save the lives of Wildlings. How's it feel to be friends with the most hated man in Castle Black?

Sentence: Here's to us then. Long may they sneer.

Sentence: I wanted to ask you something. To ask something of you. Send me, Gilly, and the baby to Oldtown so I can become a Maester. That's what I'm meant to be, not this.

Sentence: I need you here, Sam. If you leave, who's left to give me advice I trust?

Name: sam
Sentence: Well, there's Edd.

Name: sam
Sentence: I'll be more use to you as a Maester. More use to everyone now that Maester Aemon's gone. The Citadel has the worldo s greatest library. I'll learn about history, strategy, healing. And other things. Things that will help when they come.

Name: sam
Sentence: If Gilly stays here then she'll die. And the baby that she named after me will die. And I'll end up dying, too, trying to protect them. Which means that the last thing that I'll see in this world will be the look in her eyes when I fail them. I'd rather see a thousand White Walkers than see that.

Name: sam
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: jon snow

Sentence: As have we all, unfortunately.

Sentence: Look at me. What did they do to me? To the king's own mother?

Sentence: It's all right. It's done. It's in the past. And of course Margaery's safety is paramount.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Whether I like her or not is completely unimportant. Margaery is the queen. Queens must command respect. Kings even more so. Not just for their own sake, but for everyone's. The High Sparrow has no respect for kings or queens. No respect for anything in this world. He has no use for the things of this world. He want to knock them down and replace them with what? With fantasies. With beggars in the street. With nothing.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You've spoken with him?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It would be a breach of confidence which he would not take lightly, given his constant prattling about the truth. I am your mother. You can always trust me.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The Small Council meeting has been postponed on the king's orders.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You once spoke of your respect for our father because he understood the necessity of working with one's rivals.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Cersei is the mother of the king. She has the king's ear and his trust. And the king has been speaking regularly with the High Sparrow about Queen Margaery and Ser Loras.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: The High Sparrow seized power knowing full well we'd bicker amongst ourselves instead of seizing it back. Here we are. Well done to us. Now the future of the Seven Kingdoms rest in his dirty, peasant hands. In a few days, he'll have a trial for me. But before that, Queen Margaery will make her walk of atonement. Yes, Margaery will repent her sins before the good people of the city.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I agree.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You've got the second largest army in Westeros. You'll bring them into the city, stop queen Margaery's humiliation before it starts, and take her back into Crown custody.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You'll take no action at all. When the Tyrell armies come, you will stand down. Are you expressly forbidden from standing down?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The whole thing will be over before anyone can call on you to do anything. When the High Sparrow is in custody or dead, preferably, and Margaery's back at Tommen's side, do you think the king will be angry at the outcome?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You hate these fanatics as much as we do. You hate what they've done to your son. Do you want Lancel back or have you given him up for good?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Then stand aside and let the people that took him from you be destroyed.

Sentence: And here, now, what great matters do the Great Khals discuss? Which little villages you'll raid, how many girls you'll get to fuck, how many horses you'll demand in tribute. You are small men. None of you are fit to lead the Dothraki. But I am. So I will.

Sentence: You're not going to serve. You're going to die.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: knocks down all the fire pits one by one. The khals cower away from the flame. The flame begins to cover the entire temple. The khals run to the door and try to escape, but the door has been barred. JORAH and DAARIO watch the temple burning from the outside. The Dothraki people gather around the burning temple. DAENERYS grabs the final fire pit and knocks it in KHAL MORO's direction. The fire engulfs the entire temple and kills all the khals. DAENERYS walks out of the fire, unharmed and naked. All the Dothraki bow to DAENERYS. JORAH and DAARIO walk up to the steps burning temple. JORAH bows to DAENERYS. DAARIO stares at her and then bows.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: How far is Mole's Town?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Sansa. Lady Brienne. When I heard you had escaped WInterfell, I feared the worst. You have no idea how happy I am to see you unharmed.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Unharmed? What are you doing here?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I rode north with the Knights of the Vale to come to your aid. They're encamped at Moat Cailin as we speak.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: To come to my aid? Did you know about Ramsay? If you didn't know, you're an idiot. If you did know, you're my enemy.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Would you like to hear about our wedding night? He never hurt my face. He needed my face, the face of Ned Stark's daughter. But the rest of me, he did what he liked with the rest of me as long as I could still give him an heir. What do you think he did?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I can't begin to contemplate --

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What do you think he did to me?

Name: brienne
Sentence: Lady Sansa asked you a question.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: He beat you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Yes, he enjoyed that. What else do you think he did?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Sansa, I --

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What else?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Did he cut you?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Maybe you did know about Ramsay all along.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I didn't know.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I thought you knew everyone's secrets.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I made a mistake, a horrible mistake. I underestimated a stranger.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The other things he did, ladies aren't supposed to talk about those things, but I imagine brothel keepers talk about them all the time. I can still feel it. I don't mean in my tender heart it still pains me so. I can still feel what he did in my body standing here right now.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I'm so sorry.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You said you would protect me.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: And I will. You must believe me when I tell you that I will.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I don't believe you anymore. I don't need you anymore. You can't protect me. You won't even be able to protect yourself if I tell Brienne to cut you down. And why shouldn't I?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Do you want me to beg for my life? If that's what you want, I will. Whatever you ask that is in my power, I will do.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What if I want you to die here and now?

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Then I will die.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You freed me from the monsters who murdered my family and you gave me to other monsters who murdered my family. Go back to Moat Cailin. My brother and I will take back the North on our own. I never want to see you again.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: I would do anything to undo what's been done to you. I know that I can't. Will you allow me to say one more thing before I go? Your great-uncle Brynden the Blackfish has gathered what remains of the Tully forces and retaken Riverrun. You might consider seeking him out. The time may come when you need an army loyal to you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I have an army.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Your brother's army.

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: Half-brother.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Who was the first?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Where did they go?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: A girl has no desires.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Who?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: A girl will poison the rum. Lady Crane is the only one who drinks it.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: If a girl could use one of the faces from the hall…

Name: arya stark
Sentence: She's a good actress.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Seems like a decent woman.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: No. Who wants her dead?

Name: arya stark
Sentence: The younger actress. She's jealous because Lady Crane is better.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: A girl has decided.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I am Theon Greyjoy...last living son of Balon Greyjoy.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: And she is your rightful ruler. Those of you that have sailed under her, and there are many of you here, you know what she is.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: She is a reaver!

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: She is a warrior!

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: She is ironborn!

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: We will find no better leader. This is our queen.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: That would have been hard to do. You weren't here. Last I heard, you were gallivanting around the world having a grand old time.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: You were gone. Yara was here. Being Ironborn. Leading Ironborn. Getting ready to bring us back to glory.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I banished you twice. You came back twice. And you saved my life. So I can't take you back and I can't send you away.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: You must send me away.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Is there a cure?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I don't know.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How long does it take?

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: I don't know that either. But I've seen what happens when it goes far enough. I'll end things before that.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: Don't be. All I've ever wanted was to serve you. Tyrion Lannister was right. I love you. I'll always love you. Goodbye, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Do not walk away from your queen, Jorah the Andal.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You have not been dismissed. You pledged yourself to me. You swore to obey my commands for the rest of your life.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Well, I command you to find the cure wherever it is in this world. I command you to heal yourself and then return to me. When I take the Seven Kingdoms, I need you by my side.

Name: varys
Sentence: In the last fortnight since our pact with the Masters, how many killings have been carried out by the Sons of the Harpy?

Name: varys
Sentence: And how many Masters have been butchered by the free men.

Name: varys
Sentence: So it's safe to say that a fragile peace has taken hold.

Name: varys
Sentence: For now is the best we get in our profession.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's not enough.

Name: varys
Sentence: Considering the city was on the brink of civil war, I'd say it's a good start.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's not enough for Meereen to have peace. They need to know Daenerys is responsible for it. The Sons of the Harpy have a good story. Resist the foreign invaders. Our queen has an even better story. Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains and...all that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes, but do they know who brought them security? Who brought about an end to the violence? We need someone the people trust, someone they know who cannot be bought or influenced.

Name: varys
Sentence: Sounds like quite the hero. Where would we find him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Who said anything about “him”?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Welcome to Meereen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: That's about the extent of my Valyrian.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Thank you for travelling all this way. I know from personal experience how uncomfortable the journey can be.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The truth is we need your help. We had hoped that we could somehow persuade you to --

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Yes.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: She did indeed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Ideally we'd avoid purifying too many nonbelievers. The Mother of Dragons has followers of many different faiths.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I'd settle for obeyed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: That sounds most excellent --

Name: varys
Sentence: A man named Stannis Baratheon was anointed as the chosen one by one of your priestesses. He, too, had a glorious destiny. He attacked King's Landing and was soundly defeated by the man standing beside me. Last I had heard, he'd been defeated again, this time at Winterfell and this time for good.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We'd be most grateful for any support you could provide the queen.

Name: varys
Sentence: I suppose it's hard for a fanatic to admit a mistake. Isn't that the whole point of being a fanatic? You're always right. Everything is the Lordo s will.

Name: varys
Sentence: And you, an honest servant of the lord, why should I trust you to know any more than the priestess who counseled Stannis?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: My friend has a healthy skepticism of religion, but we are all loyal supporters of the queen.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We can't defend the north from the Walkers and the south from the Boltons. If we want to survive, we need Winterfell, and to take Winterfell, we need more men.

Name: davos
Sentence: Aside from the Starks and the Boltons, the most powerful houses in the North are the Umbers, the Karstarks, and the Manderlys.

Name: davos
Sentence: The Umbers and the Karstarks have already declared for the Boltons, so we're not doing so well there.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The Umbers gave Rickon to our enemies. They can hang. But the Karstarks declared for Ramsay without knowing they had another choice.

Name: davos
Sentence: I beg your pardon, my lady, but they know that a Stark beheaded their father. I don't think we can count on them either.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: How well do you know the North, Ser Davos?

Name: davos
Sentence: Precious little, my lady.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: My father always said Northerners are different. More loyal, more suspicious of outsiders.

Name: davos
Sentence: They may well be loyal, but how many rose up against the Boltons when they betrayed your family? I may not know the North, but I know men. They're more or less the same in any corner of the world and even the bravest of them don't want to see their wives and children skinned for a lost cause. If Jon's going to convince them to fight alongside him, they need to believe it's a fight they can win.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There are more than three other houses in the North -- Glover, Mormont, Cerwyn, Mazin, Hornwood. Two dozen more. Together they equal all the others. We can start small and build.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The North remembers. They remember the Stark name. People will still risk everything for it, from White Harbor to Ramsay's own door.

Name: davos
Sentence: I don't doubt it. But Jon doesn't have the Stark name.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No, but I do.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Jon is every bit as much Ned Stark's son as Ramsay is Roose Bolton's. Ant there are also the Tullys. They're not Northern, but they will back us against the Boltons without question.

Name: davos
Sentence: I didn't know the Tullys still had an army.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: My uncle the Blackfish has reformed it and retaken Riverrun.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How do you know that?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Ramsay received a raven before I escaped Winterfell.

Name: davos
Sentence: That's good. The Blackfish is a legend. His support would mean a great deal. Stark, Tully, a few more houses, almost starts to look like a winning side.

Name: brienne
Sentence: I've sworn to protect you, my lady.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You heard them. We need more men and my uncle has an army.

Name: brienne
Sentence: We can send the Blackfish a raven.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Can't risk Ramsay intercepting it. It has to be you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Ride for Riverrun. My uncle will talk to you and you'll know how to talk to him.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What is it?

Name: brienne
Sentence: I don't like leaving you here alone.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: With Jon?

Name: brienne
Sentence: Not him. He seems trustworthy. A bit brooding, perhaps. I suppose that's understandable, considering. The others, though. Davos and the Red Woman helped a man murder his own brother with blood magic. And when Stannis paid for his crime, where were they? Already out looking for a leader with better prospects. And that wildling fellow with the beard --

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Jon isn't Tormund. Jon isn't Davos, the Red Woman, or Stannis for that matter. Jon is Jon. He's my brother. He'll keep me safe. I trust him.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Then why did you lie to him when he asked you how you learned about Riverrun?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: New dress?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I made it myself. Do you like it?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Year, it's -- I like the wolf bit.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Good, because I made this for you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I made it like the one Father used to wear. As near as I can remember.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Thank you, Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're welcome.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Don't knock it down while I'm gone.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, yes. Once you get south of the Riverlands, very different sorts of trees start to take over. Maple, elm, beech, poplar. The odd willow. And of course now that summer's over, you'll start seeing the autumn colors coming in. Still, you'll find more green here than anywhere else.

Name: sam
Sentence: I didn't think I'd ever come back here after my father made me renounce my title and inheritance and, well, threaten to kill me if I didn't. A person just doesn't feel welcome at that point.

Name: sam
Sentence: And I certainly didn't expect to be introducing him to my family. So you know what to tell them.

Name: sam
Sentence: Yes, now that's very important. If he thinks that Little Sam is his grandchild, he'll take you in. He'll get an education. He'll learn to read. And you can help teach him. Huh?

Name: sam
Sentence: I told them I met you in the North.

Name: sam
Sentence: Well, it wasn't a very large piece of parchment.

Name: sam
Sentence: The thing is...my father doesn't like wildlings. He hoped I'd make a man of myself by “killing some bloody wildlings,” so it's probably a good subject to avoid if at all possible.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, hello, Mother.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh.

Name: sam
Sentence: Talla? Gods, you're a woman now.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, um, Mother, this is Gilly.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, and this, this is our son Samwell.

Name: sam
Sentence: Where is Father? And Dickon?

Name: sam
Sentence: It's beautiful. You're beautiful.

Name: sam
Sentence: This venison, it's very tasty. Is it from today's hunt?

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, of course. Sorry. Long journey.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, that's a fair distance.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, yes. Yes. A good amount. North of the Wall, you don't hunt, you don't eat.

Name: sam
Sentence: Rabbits. Sometimes squirrels. I say “we,” it's my friend Jon mostly. Sometimes Edd. Oh, and Gilly. She's- - she's quite a good hunter as well. Um, huntress.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, yes. Yes, please. Thank you, Mother.

Name: sam
Sentence: I travelled south under orders from the Lord Commander. He wants me to- -

Name: sam
Sentence: Yes. And once I have my chain, I'll return to Castle Black.

Name: sam
Sentence: Gilly.

Name: sam
Sentence: I'm sorry I let him treat you that way. I was afraid he'd turn you and Little Sam away.

Name: sam
Sentence: First light.

Name: sam
Sentence: Say good-bye to him for me.

Name: sam
Sentence: Good-bye, Gilly.

Name: sam
Sentence: We're leaving.

Name: sam
Sentence: Get your things.

Name: sam
Sentence: We belong together. All of us.

Name: sam
Sentence: Oh, they'll understand.

Name: sam
Sentence: She won't mind. Looks better on you anyway.

Name: sam
Sentence: It's my family's sword.

Name: sam
Sentence: He can bloody well try.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Nothing.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Three times.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: No.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: You're very good.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: So change it. It would all just be farting, belching, and slapping without you.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: The queen loves her son more than anything. And he was taken from her before she could say good-bye. She wouldn't just cry. She would be angry. She would want to kill the person who did this to her.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Mercy.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: I have to go. My father's waiting for me.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Careful of that one. She wants you dead.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: My lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Sorry to interrupt. We're here for Queen Margaery and Ser Loras Tyrell. Give them to us and we'll be on our way.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I speak for King Tommen of House Baratheon, First of His Name.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You already insulted one great house. It won't happen twice. Every last sparrow will die before Margaery walks down that street.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He's beaten us. That's what's happening.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I've been a member of the Kingsguard since before you were born. You don't have to do this. You don't have to do anything.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Not when you're sitting in that chair.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Will I be walking naked in the streets? Or will I spend a few months in the sept dungeons first to teach me about the gods' mercy?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm being sent to deal with the Blackfish. Apparently Walder Frey can't manage it on his own because he's 400 years old. Sent me with an army to the Riverlands and a siege that could last months.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: BEtter you're elsewhere at the head of an army than in the sept dungeons.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm not going to the Riverlands.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What, then?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm going to give Bronn the largest bag of gold anyone's ever seen and have him gather the best killers he knows. I'll take them to the sept and I'll remove the High Sparrow's head and every other sparrow head I can find.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You can't.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He has our son! He stole our son! He's torn our family apart. How should we treat people who tear us apart?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: We should treat them without mercy and we will. But if you kill the High Sparrow, you won't leave the sept alive. And without you, this is all for nothing. Stand at the head of our army where you belong, where Father wanted you. Show our men where their loyalties belong. Show them what lannisters are, what we do to our enemies. And take that stupid little castle back because it's ours and because you can.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You'll stand trial soon. I need to he here for you.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It will be a trial by combat. I have the Mountain. They've made us both stronger, all of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: They have no idea how strong we are. No idea what we're going to do to them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: We've always been together. We'll always be together. We're the only two people in the world.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many days' ride to Meereen?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: How many ships will I need to bring my khalasar to Westeros?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And who has that many?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Nobody yet.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I take what is mine.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: What was I made for?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Wait here.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Every khal who ever lived chose three blood riders to fight beside him and guard his way. But I am not a khal. I will not choose three blood riders. I choose you all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I will ask more of you than any khal has ever asked of his khalassar! Will you ride the wooden horses across the black salt sea?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Will you kill my enemies in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Will you give me the Seven Kingdoms, the gift Khal Drogo promised me before the Mother of Mountains?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Are you with me?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Now and always?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Does it move or talk? I want to speak with you alone.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Oh, this is madness!

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You're not in your sanctuary now, my dear. All I have to do is whistle and my men will stroll in here and bash you about...

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: until I tell them to stop. If I tell them to stop. You could use a good bashing.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What have they done to you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: We marched for you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And what about your brother? What mercy did they show him?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Have you lost your mind?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: He is the heir to Highgarden, the future of House Tyrell.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: As a mindless fanatic.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You will leave for Highgarden today. There is no law that says you must stay here.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I will never leave you. Never.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I'll see you soon, my dear.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: That's what'll happen to you if we lose. The Boltons, the Karstarks, the Umbers, they know you're here. They know that more than half of you are women and children. After they finish with me, they'll come for you. You're right. This isn't your fight. You shouldn't have to come to Winterfell with me. I shouldn't be asking you. It's not the deal we made. I need you with me if we're gonna beat them, and we need to beat them if you're going to survive.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Are you sure they'll come?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I heard you were leaving King's Landing.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: That is hardly your concern.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Your grandson is still a prisoner. You'll leave him rotting in a cell?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Loras rots in a cell because of you. THe High Sparrow rules this city because of you. Our two ancient houses face collapse because of you and your stupidity.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're right. I made a terrible mistake. I carry it with me every single day.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Good.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I delivered an army of fanatics onto our doorstep. And now we must fight them together. We need each other.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I wonder if you're the worst person I've ever met. At a certain age, it's hard to recall. But the truly vile do stand out through the years. Do you remember the way you smirked at me when my grandson and granddaughter were dragged off to their cells? I do. I'll never forget it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You love your granddaughter. I love my son. It's the only truth I know. We must defend them.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: I'm leaving this wretched city as fast as I can before that shoeless zealot throws me into one of his cells. If you're half as bright as you think you are, you'll find your way out of here, too.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Never. I'll never leave my son.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What'll you do, then? You have no support. Not anymore. Your brother's gone. The High Sparrow saw to that. The rest of your family have abandoned you. The people despise you. You're surrounded by enemies, thousands of them. You're going to kill them all by yourself? You've lost, Cersei. It's the only joy I can find in all this misery.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Now, that is a sorry attempt at a siege. Someone needs to teach those sad twats how to dig trenches.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Someone certainly does.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Oh, no. Not me. I'm just an upjumped sellsword.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You're an anointed knight. There's quite a difference.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Aye, knights don't get paid.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You have better instincts than any officer in the Lannister army.

Name: bronn
Sentence: That's like saying I have a bigger cock than anyone in the Unsullied army.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I expect to command all the Lannister forces before long. You can be the right hand I lost.

Name: bronn
Sentence: You promised me a lordship and a castle and a highborn beauty for a wife.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: And you'll get all three. A Lannister always- -

Name: bronn
Sentence: Don't say it. Don't fucking say it.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Lothar, is it?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Cause you didn't set up a proper perimeter. You just allowed 8,000 men to approach unchallenged.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Good thing we're friends or we'd be fucking you in the ass right now.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Have Lord Edmure bathed and fed.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Only a fool makes threats he's not prepared to carry out. Now let's say I threatened to hit you unless you shut your mouth, but you kept talking. What do you think I'd do?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm here by the king's command to take back this castle. Have him bathed and fed. Unless you'd like to take his place.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The siege is now under my command. The next time the Blackfish looks out from those ramparts, he'll see an army at his gates, not whatever this is.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Have your lads start digging perimeter trenches. Set pickets every hundred yards. And work double-time on those siege towers and trebuchets.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: As I said, the siege is under my command. If that's not to your liking, go home.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Get word to the Blackfish. I want a parley.

Name: bronn
Sentence: A parley or a fight?

Sentence: We'll never get him back. Rickon is Ned Starks trueborn son, which makes him a greater threat to Ramsay than you, a bastard, or me, a girl. As long as he lives, Ramsay's claim to Winterfell will be contested, which means he won't live long.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We can't give up on our brother.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Listen to me, please. He wants you to make a mistake.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Of course he does. What should I do differently?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I don't know! I don't know anything about battles! Just don't do what he wants you to do.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Aye, that's good advice.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You think that's obvious?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Well, it is a bit obvious.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: If you had asked for my advice earlier, I would have told you not to attack Winterfell until we have a larger force, or is that obvious, too?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: When will we have a larger force?! We've pleaded with every house that'll have us! The Blackfish can't help us! We're lucky to have this many men!

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: It's not enough!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Now, it's not enough! It's what we have! Battles have been won against greater odds.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: If Ramsay wins, I'm not going back there alive. Do you understand me?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: SNOW I won't ever let him touch you again. I'll protect you, I promise.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No one can protect me. No one can protect anyone.

Name: davos
Sentence: You think there's hope?

Name: davos
Sentence: It wasn't the Boltons defeated Stannis. It was Stannis himself. I loved the man. He lifted me up and made me something. But he had demons in his skull whispering foul things.

Name: davos
Sentence: What?

Name: davos
Sentence: No, it's a manner of speaking. Not actual demons.

Name: davos
Sentence: Maybe that was our mistake, believing in kings.

Name: davos
Sentence: No, he's not.

Name: davos
Sentence: No, thanks. It does sound delicious, but I better keep a clear head. I can never sleep the night before a battle.

Name: davos
Sentence: I walk. Think and walk. Think and walk until I'm far enough away from camp that no one can hear me shitting my guts out.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: My lady. You weren't at the war council.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Any advice?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: If I do, if I fall, don't bring me back.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm ordering you not to bring me back.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're in my camp. I'm the commander.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: How do you know what he commands?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Why?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What kind of god would do something like that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Last time we saw each other was at Winterfell, yes? You were making jokes about my height, I seem to recall. Everyone who makes a joke about a dwarf's height thinks he's the only person ever to make a joke about a dwarf's height. “The height of nobility,” “a man of your stature,” “someone to look up to.” You're all making the same five or six jokes.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: It was a long time ago.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It was. And how have things been going for you since then? Not so well, I gather. Can't imagine you would have murdered the Stark boys if things had been going well.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I didn't murder the Stark boys. But I did things that were just as bad or worse.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Doesn't seem like it. He's still alive. It was complicated for you, I'm sure, growing up at Winterfell. Never quite knowing who you were. But then, we all live complicated lives, don't we?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You've brought us 100 ships from the Iron Fleet with men to sail them. In return, I expect you want me to support your claim to the throne of the Iron Islands?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Not my claim. Hers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And what's wrong with you?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: I'm not fit to rule.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We can agree upon that at least.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Has the Iron Islands ever had a queen before?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Our Uncle Euron returned home after a long absence. He murdered our father and took the Salt Throne from yara. He would have murdered us if we had stayed.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Lord Tyrion tells me your father was a terrible king.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We do. And both murdered by a usurper as well.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Will their ships be enough?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: With the former Masters' fleet, possibly. Barely. There are more than 100 ships in the Iron Fleet.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: There are and Euron is building more. He's going to offer them to you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So why shouldn't I wait for him?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: The Iron Fleet isn't all he's bringing. He also wants to give you --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And I imagine your offer is free of any marriage demands?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: He murdered our father and would have murdered us. He'll murder you as soon as you have what he wants.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: The Seven Kingdoms.

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: All of them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And you don't want the Seven Kingdoms?

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: Your ancestors defeated ours and took the Iron Islands. We ask you to give them back.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And that's all?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Reasonable.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: What if everyone starts demanding their independence?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: She's not demanding, she's asking. The others are free to ask as well. Our father were evil men, all of us here. They left the world worse than they found it. We're not going to do that. We're going to leave the world better than we found it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You will support my claim as queen of the Seven Kingdoms and respect the integrity of the Seven Kingdoms. No more reaving, roving, raiding, or raping.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No more.

Name: davos
Sentence: Prepare to charge! Prepare to charge!

Name: davos
Sentence: Go! Go! Follow your commander!

Name: davos
Sentence: We'll just kill our own men. Stand down.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Get word --

Name: davos
Sentence: We may as well be taking shits back here.

Name: davos
Sentence: Follow!

Name: davos
Sentence: With me, lads! Break their line!

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We're going to bury my brother in the crypt next to my father.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Jon.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Where is he?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Your words will disappear. Your house will disappear. Your name will disappear. All memory of you will disappear.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You haven't fed them in seven days. You said it yourself.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: They were. Now they're starving.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Confess. Confess.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Confess.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Confess. It felt good. Beating me, starving me, frightening me, humiliating me. You didn't do it because you cared about my atonement. You did it because it felt good. I understand. I do things because they feel good. I drink because it feels good. I killed my husband because it felt good to be rid of him. I fuck my brother because it feels good to feel him inside me. I lie about fucking my brother… because it feels good to keep our son safe from hateful hypocrites. I killed your High Sparrow… and all his little sparrows… all his septons, all his septas, all his filthy soldiers, because it felt good to watch them burn. It felt good to imagine their shock and their pain. No thought has ever given me greater joy. Even confessing feels good under the right circumstances.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You've always been quiet.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I said my face would be the last thing you saw before you died. Do you remember?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What? Now? Today? You're not going to die today. You're not going to die for quite a while. Ser Gregor.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: This is Ser Gregor Clegane. He's quiet, too.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Your gods have forsaken you. This is your god now.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Shame.

Name: bronn
Sentence: You don't even have to do anything, do you?

Name: bronn
Sentence: You just sit there, a rich slab of beef, and all the birds come pecking.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You're welcome to her.

Name: bronn
Sentence: She doesn't want me. She wants your golden fingers up her twat.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Those two have their eyes on you.

Name: bronn
Sentence: They have their eyes on you, cunt.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Not my type.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Not blonde enough?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Ladies, have you met Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, hero of the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: There you go.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Maybe I'm not in the mood.

Name: bronn
Sentence: Fuck it.

Name: bronn
Sentence: No need to call me ser just because I'm an anointed knight.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: I'm sure he would be.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Have you done much fighting yourself, Lord Frey?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: No, but back in your day.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Yes, you're a great conqueror.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They don't fear the Freys, though. They fear the Lannisters. We gave you the Riverlands to hold the Riverlands. If we have to ride north and take them back for you every time you lose them, why do we need you?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Show me.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He should be with his grandfather, his brother, his sister. Burn him and bury his ashes where the sept once stood.

Name: sam
Sentence: Hello.

Name: sam
Sentence: From Lord Commander Snow at Castle Black.

Name: sam
Sentence: I'm-- I'm to be the new maester.

Name: sam
Sentence: He died.

Name: sam
Sentence: Maester Aemon became quite ill shortly after the election. He's since passed away. Which is why I'm here.

Name: sam
Sentence: Yes, well, I suppose that life is irregular.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: When we had feasts, our family would sit up here… and I'd sit down there.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Aye, you're right. I was luckier than most.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What is that?

Name: davos
Sentence: Tell him. Tell him who it belonged to.

Name: davos
Sentence: Tell him what you did to her. Tell him!

Name: davos
Sentence: Why?

Name: davos
Sentence: You burned a little girl alive!

Name: davos
Sentence: If he commands you to burn children, your Lord is evil!

Name: davos
Sentence: I loved that girl like she was my own. She was good. She was kind. And you killed her!

Name: davos
Sentence: The only way for what? They all died anyway! You told everyone Stannis was the one. You had him believing it, all of them fooled. And you lied.

Name: davos
Sentence: Aye, you were wrong. How many died because you were wrong?

Name: davos
Sentence: I ask your leave to execute this woman for murder. She admits to the crime.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Do you have anything to say for yourself?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Ride south today. If you return to the North, I'll have you hanged as a murderer.

Name: davos
Sentence: If you ever come back this way, I will execute you myself.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm having the lordo s chamber prepared for you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Mother and Father's room? You should take it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm not a Stark.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You are to me.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You're the Lady of Winterfell. You deserve it. We're standing here because of you. The battle was lost until the Knights of the Vale rode in. They came because of you. You told me Lord Baelish sold you to the Boltons.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He did.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And you trust him?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Only a fool would trust Littlefinger. I should have told you about him, about the Knights of the Vale. I'm sorry.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We need to trust each other. We can't fight a war amongst ourselves. We have so many enemies now.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Jon.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: A raven came from the Citadel. A white raven. Winter is here.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Well, Father always promised, didn't he?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: The last time a Tyrell came to Dorne, he was assassinated. 100 red scorpions, was it?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: You murder your own prince, but you expect me to trust you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: What is your name again? Barbaro?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Obara. You look like an angry little boy. Don't presume to tell me what I need.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Do shut up, dear.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Anything from you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: No? Good. Let the grown women speak.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: Cersei stole the future from me. She killed my son. She killed my grandson. She killed my granddaughter. Survival is not what I'm after now.

Name: olenna tyrell
Sentence: And what is my heart's desire?

Name: varys
Sentence: Fire and blood.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You're not coming with us.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You're not going to Westeros. You're staying here with the Second Sons. There's finally peace in Meereen. You will keep the peace while the people choose their own leaders.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: You promised me. “My sword is yours. My life is yours.” This is what I command. If I'm going to rule in Westeros, I'll need to make alliances. The best way to make alliances is with marriage.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I don't know. Maybe no one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I can't bring a lover to Westeros.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So that's what you want? To be my mistress?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I can't.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No one tells me to do anything.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Don't get angry.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: A great number of women, I imagine. Specific orders will be left for you regarding the welfare of Meereen and the Bay of Dragons.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: We can't call it Slaver's Bay anymore, can we?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Farewell, Daario Naharis.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: How did he take it?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No tears.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I know it was hard for you. You turned away a man who truly loves you because he would have been a liability in the Seven Kingdoms. That's the kind of self-sacrifice that makes for a good ruler, if it's any consolation.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It's not.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: No, I suppose not. I'm terrible at consoling.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Yes, you really are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: All right, how about the fact that this is actually happening? You have your armies, you have your ships, you have your dragons. Everything you've ever wanted since you were old enough to want anything. It's all yours for the taking. Are you afraid?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Good. You're in the great game now. And the great game's terrifying. The only people who aren't afraid of failure are madmen like your father.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Do you know what frightens me? I said farewell to a man who loves me. A man I thought I cared for. And I felt nothing. Just impatient to get on with it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: He wasn't the first to love you and he won't be the last.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Well, you have completely failed to console me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: For what it's worth, I've been a cynic for as long as I can remember. Everyone's always asking me to believe in things-- family, gods, kings, myself. It was often tempting until I saw where belief got people. So I said no, thank you to belief. And yet here I am.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: I believe in you. It's embarrassing, really. I'd swear you my sword, but I don't actually own a sword.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: It's your counsel I need.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: It's yours. Now and always.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Good. I, um… I had something made for you. I'm not sure if it's right.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Tyrion Lannister, I name you Hand of the Queen.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: My name is Arya Stark. I want you to know that. The last thing you're ever going to see is a Stark smiling down at you as you die.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I'm done with all that. I came here every day when I was a girl. I prayed to be somewhere else. Back then I only ever thought about what I wanted, never about what I had.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I was a stupid girl.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I was wrong.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: It's a pretty picture.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You've declared for other houses before, Lord Baelish. It's never stopped you from serving yourself.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The free folk, the northerners, and the Knights of the Vale fought bravely, fought together, and we won. My father uses to say we find our true friends on the battlefield.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The war is not over. And I promise you, friend, the true enemy won't wait out the storm. He brings the storm.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There's nothing to forgive, my lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Come on.

Name: arya stark
Sentence: When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I want every northern maester to scour their records for any mention of dragonglass. Dragonglass kills white walkers. It's more valuable to us now than gold. We need to find it, we need to mine it, we need to make weapons from it. Everyone aged 10 to 60 will drill daily with spears, pikes, bow and arrow.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Not just the boys.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: We can't defend the North if only half the population is fighting.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: While we're preparing for attack, we need to shore up our defenses. The only thing standing between us and the Army of the Dead is the Wall and the Wall hasn't been properly manned in centuries. I'm not the king of the Free Folk.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: But if we're going to survive this winter together...

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Last time we saw the Night King was at Hardhome. The closest castle to Hardhome is Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: If they breach the wall, the first two castles in their path are Last Hearth and Karhold.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: The castles committed no crimes. And we need every fortress we have for the war to come. We should give the Last Hearth and Karhold to new families, loyal families who supported us against Ramsay.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The Umbers and the Karstarks have fought beside the Starks for centuries. They've kept faith for generation after generation.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: And then they broke faith.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm not going to strip these families of their ancestral homes because of the crimes of a few reckless sons.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: So there's no punishment for treason and no reward for loyalty?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: The punishment for treason is death. Smalljon Umber died on the field of battle. Harald Karstark died on the field of battle.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: They died fighting for Ramsay. Give the castles to the families of the men who died fighting for you.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: When I was Lord Commander of the Night's Watch I executed men who betrayed me. I executed men who refused to follow orders. My father always said, "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword," and I have tried to live by those words. But I will not punish a son for his father's sins, and I will not take a family home away from a family it has belonged to for centuries. That is my decision, and my decision is final.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Ned Umber.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Alys Karstark.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: For centuries, our families fought side by side on the battlefield. I ask you to pledge your loyalty once again to House Stark, to serve as our bannermen and come to our aid whenever called upon.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Stand.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Yesterday's wars don't matter anymore. The North needs to band together, all the living north. Will you stand beside me, Ned and Alys, now and always?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You are my sister, but I am king now.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Will you start wearing a crown?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: When you question my decisions in front of the other lords and ladies, you undermine me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: So I can't question your decisions anymore?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Of course you can, but--

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Joffrey never let anyone question his authority. You think he was a good king?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Do you think I'm Joffrey?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're as far from Joffrey as anyone I've ever met.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're good at this, you know.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: At what?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: At ruling.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You are. You are. They respect you, they really do, but you have to--

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Why are you laughing?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: What did father used to say? Everything before the word "but" is horse shit.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: He never said that to me.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: No. No, he never cursed in front of his girls.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Because he was trying to protect us. He never wanted us to see how dirty the world really is, but Father couldn't protect me and neither can you. Stop trying.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: All right, I'll stop trying to protect you and you stop trying to undermine me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I'm not trying to undermine you.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You have to be smarter than Father. You need to be smarter than Robb. I loved them, I miss them, but they made stupid mistakes, and they both lost their heads for it.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: And how should I be smarter? By listening to you?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: Would that be so terrible?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Cersei of House Lannister, First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms--

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What does she want?

Name: jon snow
Sentence: Come to King's Landing. Bend the knee or suffer the fate of all traitors.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You've been so consumed with the enemy to the north, you've forgotten about the one to the south.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: I'm consumed with the Night King because I've seen him. And believe me, you'd think of little else if you had, too.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: We still have a wall between us and the Night King. Theres nothing between us and Cersei.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: There's a thousand miles between us and Cersei. Winter is here. The Lannisters are a southern army. They've never ranged this far north.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: You're the military man, but I know her. If you're her enemy, she'll never stop until she's destroyed you. Everyone who's ever crossed her, she's found a way to murder.

Name: jon snow
Sentence: You almost sound as if you admire her.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I learned a great deal from her.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: What is this?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Its what we've been waiting for our whole lives. It's what Father trained us for, whether he knew it or not.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: He knew it. Made me memorize every damn city, town, lake, forest, and mountain.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It's ours now, we just have to take it.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You've been quiet since you came home. Are you angry with me?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: No, not angry.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Are you afraid of me?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Should I be?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Daenerys Targaryen has chosen Tyrion to be her Hand. Right now, they're sailing across the Narrow Sea, hoping to take back her father's throne. Our little brother, the one you love so much, the one you set free, the one who murdered our father and our first-born son, now he stands beside our enemies and gives them counsel. He's out there somewhere at the head of an armada. Where will they land?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Dragonstone.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They have deep-water ports for the ships. Stannis left the castle unoccupied, and that's where she was born.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the east.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the south--Ellaria Sand and her brood of bitches.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the west--Olenna, the old cunt. Another traitor.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the north. Ned Stark's bastard has been named King in the North and that murdering whore Sansa stands beside him. Enemies everywhere. We're surrounded by traitors. You're in command of the Lannister army now. How do we proceed?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Winter is here. We can't win a war if we can't feed our men and our horses. The Tyrells have the grain, the Tyrells have the livestock.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Will the Tyrell bannermen stand alongside a Dothraki horde and Unsullied slave soldiers?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: If they think Daenerys will win. No one wants to fight on the losing side. Right now, we look like the losing side.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I'm the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Three kingdoms, at best. I'm not sure you understand how much danger we're in.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I understand we're in a war for survival. I understand whoever loses dies. I understand whoever wins could launch a dynasty that lasts a thousand years.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: A dynasty for whom? Our children are dead. We're the last of us.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: A dynasty for us, then.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We never talked about Tommen.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: There's nothing to say.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Our baby boy killed himself.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: He betrayed me. He betrayed us both. Should we spend our days mourning the dead--mother, father, and all our children?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Cersei--

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I loved them. I did. But they're ashes now and we're still flesh and blood. We're the last Lannisters, the last ones who count.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Even Lannisters can't survive without allies. Where are our allies now? You saw what happened to Walder Frey and his family.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I heard. How could we ever trust a man like that?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: We couldn't. He was a useless, old coward, but the Freys supported us. Now they're all dead. Whoever killed them is no friend of ours. We need allies. Stronger, better allies. We can't win this war alone.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You think I listened to Father for 40 years and learned nothing?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The Greyjoys? You invited the Greyjoys to King's Landing?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Not all of them.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Well, it looks like all of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I invited Euron Greyjoy, the new King of the Iron Islands. You said yourself we needed stronger, better allies. There you are.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: How are they better allies? How are they different from the Freys? They both broke their promises and murdered their former friends as soon as it suited them.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: So does everyone when it suits them. Unlike the Freys, they have ships. And they're good at killing.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: They're not good at anything. I know the Ironborn. They're bitter, angry little people. All they know how to do is steal things they can't build or grow themselves.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: Euron Greyjoy didn't come here for that.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: Oh, what did he come here for, then?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: A queen.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: You're not a rightful monarch, though, are you?

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The Greyjoys rebelled agains the throne for the right to be monarchs, but as I recall, you were soundly defeated. Come to mention it, weren't you the one who started that rebellion by sailing to Casterly Rock and burning the Lannister fleet? You certainly caught us there. Very smart move on your part. Of course, we all made it to the Iron Islands anyway. I was there.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: The people I was cutting down were your own kin.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: And I enjoyed killing Greyjoys.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: If not the most humble.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: What do you want in return?

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: I decline your proposal.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You're not trustworthy. You've broken promises to allies before and murdered them at the nearest opportunity. You murdered your own brother.

Name: sam
Sentence: Archmaester, I was wondering...

Name: sam
Sentence: I was wondering if you had considered my proposition.

Name: sam
Sentence: I asked you if, in light of what I've seen in the North, if I could have access to the restricted area of the library.

Name: sam
Sentence: No.

Name: sam
Sentence: Archmaester, with respect, I've seen them--the Army of the Dead. The white walkers. W was sent here to learn how to defeat them, but everyone in the Citadel, those who will even talk to me, they all doubt the walkers ever existed in the first place.

Name: sam
Sentence: Sources in the restricted area?

Name: sam
Sentence: So, you believe me.

Name: sam
Sentence: That makes you the only person south of the Twins who does.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Nope.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: What do you want, Lord Baelish?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I am safe. I'm at home, surrounded by friends. I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: At the moment, peace and quiet.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.

Name: brienne
Sentence: Why is he still here?

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: We need his men. Without the Vale, Ramsay Bolton would still hold this castle. Littlefinger saved us.

Name: brienne
Sentence: He wants something.

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: I know exactly what he wants.

Name: arya stark

Sentence: I don't want to steal your food.

Name: arya stark

Name: arya stark
Sentence: Not so bad, is it?

Name: arya stark

Name: sam
Sentence: It's a map of Dragonstone. The Targaryens built their first stronghold there when they invaded Westeros.

Name: sam
Sentence: A mountain of it. Beneath the ground. Stannis told me, but I didn't think... This is important. Jon needs to know.

Sentence: Shall we begin?

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: On a night like this, you came into the world.

Name: varys
Sentence: I remember that storm. All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I wish I could remember it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I always thought this would be a homecoming. It doesn't feel like home.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: We won't stay on Dragonstone for long.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Good.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Not so many lions.

Name: varys
Sentence: Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms. The lord of Westeros despise her. Even before your arrival, they plotted against her. Now...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: They cry out for their true queen? They drink secret toasts to my health?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: People used to tell my brother that sort of thing, and he was stupid enough to believe them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: If Viserys had three dragons and an army at his back, he'd have invaded King's Landing already.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Conquering Westeros would be easy for you. But you're not here to be queen of the ashes.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: No.

Sentence: We can take the Seven Kingdoms without turning it into a slaughterhouse. If the great houses support your claim against Cersei, the game is won. With the Tyrell army and the Dornish on our side, we have powerful allies in the south.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I never properly thanked you for that.

Name: varys
Sentence: They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.

Sentence: You served my father, didn't you, Lord Varys?

Name: varys
Sentence: I did.

Name: daenerys targaryen

Name: varys
Sentence: I had a choice, Your Grace--serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: But you didn't serve him long. You turned against him.

Name: varys
Sentence: Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure. There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King. Robert was neither mad nor cruel. He simply had no interest in being king.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So you took it upon yourself to find a better one.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, when I was ready to drink myself into a small coffin, Lord Varys told me about a queen in the east who--

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Before I came to power, you favored my brother. All your spies, your little birds, did they tell you Viserys was cruel, stupid, and weak? Would those qualities have made for a good king in your learned opinion?

Name: varys
Sentence: Until your marriage to Khal Drogo, Your Grace, I knew nothing about you, save your existence and that you were said to be beautiful.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: So you and your friends traded me like a prized horse to the Dothraki.

Name: varys
Sentence: Which you turned to your advantage.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who gave the order to kill me?

Name: varys
Sentence: King Robert.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who hired the assassins?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Who sent word to Essos to murder Daenerys Targaryen?

Name: varys
Sentence: Your Grace, I did what had to be done to--

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: To keep yourself alive.

Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: Lord Varys has proven himself a loyal servant.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Proven himself loyal? Quite the opposite. If he dislikes one monarch, he conspires to crown the next one. What king of a servant is that?

Name: varys
Sentence: The kind the realm needs. Incompetence should not be rewarded with blind loyalty. As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them. I wasn't born into a great house. I came from nothing. I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering. When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses. You wish to know where my true loyalties lie? Not with any king or queen, but with the people. The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule. The people whose hearts you aim to win. If you demand blind allegiance, I respect your wishes. Grey Worm can behead me or your dragons can devour me. But if you let me live, I will serve you well. I will dedicate myself to seeing you on the Iron Throne because I choose you. Because I know the people have no better chance than you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: Swear this to me, Varys. If you ever think I'm failing the people, you won't conspire behind my back. You'll look me in the eye as you have done today, and you'll tell me how I'm failing them.

Name: varys
Sentence: I swear it, my queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: And I swear this--if you ever betray me, I'll burn you alive.

Name: varys
Sentence: I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.

Sentence: The Red Priests helped bring peace to Meereen. You are very welcome here. What is your name?

Name: varys
Sentence: She once served another who wanted the Iron Throne. It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?

Sentence: You chose an auspicious day to arrive at Dragonstone.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: If the Mad King's daughter takes the Iron Throne, she will destroy the Realm as we know it. Some of you are bannermen of House Tyrell. But House Tyrell is in open rebellion against the Crown. With their help the Mad King's daughter has ferried an army of savages to our shores. Mindless Unsullied soldiers who will destroy your castles and your holdfasts. Dothraki heathens who will burn your villages to the ground, rape and enslave your women, and butcher your children without a second thought. This is how Olenna Tyrell rewards centuries of service and loyalty.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: You all remember the Mad King. You remember the horrors he inflicted upon his people. His daughter is no different. In Essos her brutality is already legendary. She crucified hundreds of noblemen in Slaver's Bay. And when she grew bored of that, she fed them to her dragons.

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: It is my solemn duty to protect the people, and I will but I need your help, My Lords. We must stand together, all of us, if we hope to stop her.

Sentence: Lord Tarley.

Sentence: Rickon, isn't it?

Sentence: I want you to be my ranking general in the wars to come. I want you to swear allegiance to Cersei and I want you to help her destroy her enemies. All of her enemies.

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: She was a great woman, once. Now she's broken. She wants revenge so badly she brought the Dothraki to our shores. The Dothraki in Westeros for the first time in history. I know you don't like my sister, but you have to make a choice. Do you fight with us or with the foreign savages and eunuchs?

Sentence: That's very nice to hear. Of course, I can't remember a queen who was better loved than my grand daughter. The common people loved her, the nobles loved her. And what is left of her now? Ashes. Commoners, nobles, they're all just children really. They won't obey you unless they fear you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: I'm grateful to you, Lady Olenna, for your council. I'm grateful to all of you. But you have chosen to follow me. I will not attack King's Landing. We will not attack King's Landing.

Sentence: Then how do you mean to take the Iron Throne? By asking nicely?

Sentence: But we won't use Dothraki and Unsullied.
